"You can put those in my office, if you please." she says plainly, your expression drops. Something soft bumps into you from behind, cutting your sentence short. A meek sound without much of a pitch peeps from behind you. The amazon doctor puts an elegant finger to her chin, counting off each of your trials on her fingers enticingly, "Well, you've done your paperwork for this week... filed our reciepts, paid the bills..." she seemed to be at a loss, until...

"I've got it, you could inspect the mansion and see to it that your employees have everything that they need!" she seemed proud of herself, a genuine smile sparked some dimples you hadn't seen before. "Oh, well sure I could do that." you search your pockets for a writing utensil, knowing fully well that you left your good pen on the dresser. "You got a pen I could use?"

Suzu chuckles, "Oh no, not now!" she waves you away, "After you have lunch with those lovely ladies in the dining hall, silly boy!" Again, your face manages to find a darker shade of red to show your embarrassment, "Oh, yeah, sure right!" you stutter as she saunters off...

You enter the dining hall to see a by now familiar sight, Kate and Anya with lots and lots of food. It seemed that the boiling hatred Anya held for Kate had settled slightly after spending an hour and a half together every week. And while Kate still hadn't spoken hair's more than a word to either one of you, much to Anya's distaste, her expressions were getting softer and softer with each passing day. In more ways than one.

Incredibly luxerious meals were one thing; rack of lamb, pheasant, quail, expensive imported sushi, sirloin, all these things were things that Mimi excelled in. But the problem was that both maids recieved a healthy surplus of food, while not near as competitive as that first day they were still far from deprived. Anya insisted on at least two healthy portions, and Kate's appetite wasn't exactly modest either. And in a week, you couldn't help but notice that those uniforms looked just a little tighter.

"Oh, hey you loser!" Anya pat your rightful seat by her at the head of the table, "We've been waiting for you!" Kate looked at you as if to agree with her redheaded counterpart, nodding excitedly. "Sorry for the wait!" you laugh, making your way across the hall to take your designated seat. As you pass Anya, Kate catches your eye, who in return blushes and starts nervously twiddling her pudgy fingers; which if you weren't mistaken looked just a little pudgier than usual.

"So, were they mad?" she barked through a heavy bite of mutton. You can't help but let out another chuckle, "Well, no one but Mika, but I think she just wants to get a bite too..." Kate's expression showed signs of a stifled giggle, "Yeah I'll bet, but let's be honest, all she does is play around and sit on her fat butt all day." she sneers to no one inparticular, "Let's be honest, us maids do all the real work!" she swallows, "You think I could get this with some barbecue sauce if I asked?"

After watching the two maids gorge themselves, noting they may require new clothing in the coming weeks, you decided to start off your little inspection by examining the workspace of Suzu. After being lead to the proper location by a sour looking Mika (who helped you only on the condition of a week of free meals you would later tell Mimi to make), you took a seat inside the office, noting a small box of munchkins on her desk.

Wiping away her powerdered fingers which seemed slightly different than usual, Suzu frowned, slightly, "Well, didn't expect you so soon."

"I just wanted to be punctual is all," you replied, "I'm sure you're doing your job fine and all, so I--" Your mouth goes dry as Suzu approached the door, closing it up behind you before turning the lock. You gulped, nervously as Suzu turned back toward you, a frown on her lips, an anxious, sullen frown. "I--er--what is the phrase?--I--"

"Don't bother speaking," Suzu replied, frowning, "Look, you seem to care about Kate, but rest assured: if you harm her, I will see to it that your achilles tendons are severed and used as clothing hangers, understand?" You were silent as you visualized that grizzly image. A grin surged across the woman's lips, which lead you to believe, for an instant, taht this was the end, that you were going to die becasue of a mad employee. However, soon she broke into a smile, patting you on the head, "I doubt you would, though."

"Whew."

As you checked all of Suzu's possessions, examining her work station, and interrogated her, a single questiom emerged in the back of your mind. It was small, almost unimportant really. However, no question had plagued him more since he arrived in this estate, and thus no other question brought him to this desperate point of need, a requirement to hear the answer, be it good or bad, as he did now.

"Why doesn't Kate speak?"


There, he had said it. Simple, done with. Suzu turned toward him, and you expected a frustrated expression. Rather, all you recieved was a morose frown. "Oh, sweetie, listen very carefully to waht I ahve to say. I don't feel like repeating it again, so rest assured this is the one and only time I'm gonna say it. When Kate was little, she was adopted by our former master, and, for awhile, she was a happy baby, always light hearted and cheerful, never wishing harm on others. However, it wasn't long before everything just changed. It was the night of Christmas Eve, I remember it well, when her old parents came back and took her home."

"Wait, i thought she was adopted."

"Just because you're adopted doesn't mean you're old family isn't still alive. Your uncle had assumed the same thing, so when they came home that day and took her away without a warrant, he found every lawyer in the country he could affort to get her back. However, from waht we could tell, there was a good reason we were lead to believe the parants were dead. After all, if they were dead, we'd make no attempt to contact them, right? Well, what happened was that, when Kate was returned to us, she was silent, refusing to speak a word. Physical examines proved her vocal cords were perfeclty fine, but..." Suzu paused, running a hand through her hair, "But, well, there was scar tissue around her vaginal walls. They were the type of scars that only come from contact with, well, metal."

For awhile, you couldn't speak. All you could do was stare at Suzu, your eyes wide. Finally, you could breath. Kate was raped. She was brutally invaded on the deepest corridors of a woman's body, invaded on the deepest level: ravaged and brutalized inside of her most sensative of realms. You felt like punching her parents with all her might, beating them seneseless as they fell to the grouond, but you doubted that would make Kate feel any good. If they found vaginal scarring on the poor girl's body, no doubt her parents were punished as it were. Kate wasn't consumed by a desire for vengance.

She was grieved by memories.

"I was just a young girl, but I still tried to take care of Kate, and your uncle eventually told me everything about her when I came of age. But Anya, well, she didn't know anything. We never bothered telling her, and her lack of knowing ended up leading her to believe it was all an act. We could never bring ourselves to telling her the trouth, but for the life of me I don't know why. Maybe you can change that, you know? Tell Anya everything. She has a right to know, ya know?"

At first, you briefly mull over sending the silly feud for attention between your maids by informing Anya of Kate's story. What Suzu just trusted you with was sacred, and if she hadn't told Anya yet then there was no reason for you to go spread it around the household. For now, it was your job to comfort Kate; to let her that you knew and felt sympathy for her.

Your thoughts are interrupted by someone tapping at your back, something soft brushing up against your rear. Mika giggled as she settle her rustled bellyfat, breaking her obviously fake bad mood with a big cheeky grin, "But, since you've gotta come to my post anyway, I guess I won't mind!" her pudgy hands wrap around your wrist, grip suprisingly strong for a girl of her size, "Come on, I'll show you the way!!" she immediately starts to waddle off at top speed, dragging you along with her without so much as an answer...

And believe it or not, you were actually out of breath trying to keep up with her! Mika was fat, but boy was she fast! Not that you cared whether or not her seams split, not only were you preoccupied with thoughts surrounding poor Kate, you also had to get over the motion sickness and catch your breath!

It had an double-wide office chair, a desk with a miniature TV on it, and a few posters taped up onto the ornate carvings that... "Wait a second, isn't this just a gazebo?" you gesture to the poorly converted 'office' that Mika held so dear, "Yup!" she put her hands on her hip, forving her belly forward proudly...

"...'Kay..." you mumble, stepping into the rather unimpressive building.

This wasn't doing much to help your predicament regarding Kate. You wanted so much just to be there for her, and all this was doing was proving to be a misleading sidequest. "Look, Mika I don't have time for-"

You watched as her cute little chunky butt, now straining the back of her maid's uniform, trembled with each movement, her eyes focused above. The days soon became weeks, five weeks to be exact. For five weeks, give or take a few days, you had taken up residence in a mansion given to you by your late Uncle Lucas and indulged in the luxery his life had to offer. Time soared by here, probably due to the lax conditioning, and before you knew it a bond of sorts had settled in with you and the hired help; a bond far beyond 'Servant' and 'Master'.

"Hey, Retard-" Anya's cute little pet names, for instance, had been tossed up to keep things interesting between you, "I'm hungry too, why does Kate get all the brownies?!" she giggles, something that you still hadn't quite gotten used to. In order to exhibit whether or not she was truly offended after she slung an insult your way, she would usually do something quite the opposite of what someone who was offended would do; like giggle, or lowering her eyelids while raising one of her red brow to form a moderately superior smirk. Deep down, you knew she didn't really hate you. "Oh, sure thing Anya." you take a few sweets from the tray, place them on Kate's piece of china, and pass the remaining platter over to Anya, who responds with a mock-haughty, "That's better."

Kate, counterclockwise from your head of the table, looks at you gratefully as she takes a dainty bite off of a sugar cookie. That was something else you hadn't quite gotten used to, after all this time Kate still hadn't said more than two words to you. Literally, two words that slipped her lips all those weeks ago were the only ones so crafty enough to escape that tightly sealed vault. But despite this, you and Kate had grown very close in the past month. Perhaps it was your deliberate spoiling of her that did so, it didn't matter so long as Kate was happy. "You like 'em?" you ask Kate simple questions every now and again, just to test to see if it would grease her conversational wheels a bit. She nods, sending her much fuller cheeks bouncing about along with her bangs.

It was evident that spoiling Kate with cookies and candies and other sweets was having an effect on her; more often than not she seemed very happy whenever she was with you, but her figure had started to get much thicker. You remembered the day she outgrew her trusty well-worn uniform, she was scared out of her wits and didn't want to change out of it; forcing her pudgy body into a much too small maid's outfit! It was cute the way her big belly stretched the black fabric to it's absolute limits, but still spilling over her waistline and folding marginally over her apron. Her skirt was far too small that day, and the poor albino could barely take a few steps let alone clean her sectors of the house. But after some motivation from you and Suzu, and attempted motivation from Anya, Kate found the courage to put on a new uniform. But in all fairness, this new one was already looking a little snug on her, you could see her gut just waiting to burst out of it!

Even Anya, slender and no-nonsense as she was, had been affected. For some bizarre reason, wherever you and Kate go, Anya seemed to wind up in the same general area! All this time around Kate had led her to claiming a few sweeties for herself, swelling her frame steadilly until she too needed new garments just a little bigger than her too-tight uniform. It wasn't really obvious unless you look at her from the side, her Z-axis was bigger by just a little bit, and you were sure every now and then you could deduce the hintings of a pot belly forming on your head maid, and if she lowered her head you could just barely make out the formings of a slighted second chin. All in all, she was still a beautiful young woman whose body was still knock'em dead hot.

"Seconds!!" even Mimi had swelled up a little bit, due to increased cooking and low impulse control. She was already a little stout, but you noticed that now her belly sagged a little further down her waistline than last month. Give or take a few factors, it was almost big enough to cover her crotch!

"No thanks Mimi, I'm-" Anya accidently lets out a very small, ladylike belch, "full..." she pats her stomach to show emphasis. Kate nods her head, impressive proportions wobbling in her excitement. Anya takes note of this, looks her up and down and glances at the clock, "Aw what the heck, we got ten minutes left." Mimi giggles, "'Kay, what about you Master?" she gets in awfully close to you, resting her chubby cheek in her hand as she leaned on the table, "What can I serve my sexually depraved Master today?"

"SEXUALLY DEPRAVED?!" you show your disapproval by, once again, freaking out and returning to a normal tone, "N-No thanks Mimi, I've contracts to go over and I just stopped by to check in on Kate and Anya." Her eyes start to water, big fake crocodile tears, you knew what she wanted. You place your hand on top of her ponytailed little head and rustle it, "And you too Mimi." She squeals, making her way back into the kitchen; her walk starting out as a slight waddle. "You mean you still haven't looked over those contracts?!" Anya, in her leaned back position, tilts her head to face you, "I've been begging you to do those for three days now!" Kate giggles, putting a small cookie on your plate to make you feel better.

Placing it in your mouth and giving off a slight grin as you depart, you hear Anya remark in a brown voice, "We gotta get you like, a dry erase board or something..."

As you take your leave back towards the daunting stairwell, Mika's now familiar bellyfat brushes up against your side. "Oh, hey Mik-" she cuts you off by grabbing your hand yet again, now thrusting it onto her bulging middle, "Can't you feel it?!" she whines, "Ever since Kate got kitchen duty there's been nothing left for me to eat, and I'm wasting away here!!" While this is obviously upsetting her, you can't help but notice just how soft her belly was... and apparantly how thinly made her uniform was.

Far from wasting away, Mika's girth was enigmatic. She was huge, yet she was just as active and limber as a child of healthy weight. Her pretty face, scrunched up in a look of dissapproval, was creased by her multiple chins and overstuffed chipmunk cheeks. To be honest, she looked like she was on the verge of hysteric tears. "You jerk, sir!" she bawled, "I'm so mad at you!"

Being reasonably afraid of upsetting a woman of Mika's enormous proportions, you stammer, "W-W-Well, alright, I-" she cuts you off by wrapping you in a big, squishy hug, "YOU'RE SO MEAN TO MIKA!!" she wails, inadvertantly cutting you off from any oxygen required to solve her dilemma, "I'm... sorry..." you wheeze, "Oh, my bad." she sounds normal as she apologizes, but quickly reverts back to histrionics, "Wh-What can I do?" you stutter, now a little wary on whether Mika was really upset or not...

Only every few hours.

Minutes.

Seconds.

I didn't realize at all. I feel stupid now. I'll go give her a box of donuts! I'll be back!" With that, Mika ran offf, faster than a jack rabbit on speed. That would have been all well and good, have been the end of the matter, had a second voice not echoed through the air at that moment, drifting into your ears.

"Nice lie," Anya said, entering the room, hands self-consciously on her slightly pudgy belly.

At first you felt she was angry at you, but the one time you passed her by that day was at dinner, and, for the entire meal, her slightly pudgy cheeks her filled with scarlet color, made even more noticeable by the fact that, whenever you’d turn to look at her, she’d turn away, embarrassed.

Every few minutes, you noticed Mika withdrawing more donuts from her office, handing them to Kate, feeding them to her by hand. It was rare nowadays to see Kate’s cheeks not filled with desert, her full lips covered in powdered sugar, or her growing belly gurgling as it digested a heavy meal.

If anything, this made Anya even more jealous than usual.

“I didn’t really think that Mika would be stupid enough to believe that dumb story,” Anya grumbled, shaking her head as she watched Mika feeding Kate from a distance, arms folded over her now doughy belly, “It’s like Mika’s trying to make her fatten up.”

You were called down by Suzu, who had appeared to lost all tone yet still appeared relatively lithe despite the slight muffin top she now sported. With a slight grin on the woman’s lips as she tossed a munchkin into her mouth, she began to speak. “In case you couldn’t notice, which I find awfully hard considering the fact you helped contribute to this evolution, a large amount of the employees require new uniforms.”

“Okay.”

“We’re going to need to have you help administer a physical exam by helping me record all the data, okay?”

Suzu stared at you as though you were a two year old being explained complex mathematics beyond the comprehension of doctorate degree mathematic graduates. “You write what I tell you to.”

The following hour, you were ordered into Suzu’s examination room. Oddly enough, despite being the owner of the sizable estate for almost two months now, you had yet to see or even hear about this room. “Huh, I suppose that there are a lot of rooms that I haven’t seen then…” you whisper to yourself as the towering doctor flips on the light switch. It was modest, as far as rooms in this mansion went, with a counter, a bed for one to lie down on with a curtain for privacy, a medicine cabinet and a two-way scale. Why Uncle Lucas would simply limit this room to examinations was beyond you, it seemed very versatile and could even function as a private sick room.

“Alright, little master.” Suzu placed her morning cup of coffee on the countertop, tying her hair back into a loose ponytail and donning the stereotypical doctor’s reflective lens, “We should get started soon enough, try not to pass out from excitement.” She says dryly bringing out the measuring tape, “I have to warn you though, this is strictly for medical purposes.” You blink, unaware of what she was driving at, “Meaning, if I catch a rocket in your pocket, I’ll be forced to put it out; permanently.”

At first, your face turns a furious red at Suzu’s suggestion; the image of you being some hyper-pervert had made it’s way around the house without much of an effort. But you realize that deep, brown threats were simply the ways that Suzu showed her affection and almost motherly protection over the rest of her housemates. Still quite red in the face, you nod vigorously without saying a single word, lest it fuel her drive to mutilate your manhood. “Alrighty then~” her demeanor changes swiftly without much warning, “Let the physical examinations begin!”

Of course, Anya was prompt as ever, meaning that she would be Doctor Suzu’s first subject. However, the maid didn’t expect your spectation, and as soon as you caught her eye, she nearly jumped out of her too-tight uniform; “OH NO!!” she hollers, pointing in your general direction, “THERE’S NO WAY IN HELL I’M TAKIN’ MY CLOTHES OFF WITH HIM IN THE ROOM!!” you can’t help but be incited, and start to snap a quip of your own before Suzu intervenes, “But Anya, the master is my assistant today.” She said in a tone usually reserved to tease/torture you, “He takes his job very seriously, and I’m sure his eyes won’t linger any longer than they have to.” She turns to you, an almost innocent grin slapped onto her face; almost being the key word. “Right?” she asks, tone deepening ever so slightly. Without much of a choice, you simply nod nervously and tap the clipboard with your pen.

Anya glares at you, narrowing her eyelids to slits; “Fine… but he has to turn around when I undress.” She hisses…

“My my, Anya!” Suzu’s bedside humor was a little bit of a stretch for you, “You’ve certainly rounded out this year!” she pats the top of Anya’s head like a doctor would a small child, “68kg from your 54kg last year!” Anya grumbles something under her breath before Suzu snaps her fingers; “Okay, strip down and we’ll take your measurements!” the redhead jumps, shocked at her physician’s sudden interest in taking her clothes off, “O-Okay!” she whimpers slightly, glaring at you to turn around. And of course, lest fear the combined fury of Anya and Suzu, you obey. What you didn’t see, or weren’t allowed to see, was Anya stripping from her uniform and reduced to far too tight undergarments.

Her pale ivory skin looked even paler and whiter in the incandescent lighting, and the shadows that loomed underneath her newfound pudge were accentuated by the brightness. Suzu grabbed measuring tape and swiftly wrapped it around Anya’s bikini line. “Hmmm… 36!” she hollered out to you, currently daydreaming on what you could possibly be missing out on. “H-Hold on Suzu, I just thought this was a physical!” You could hear Suzu chuckle, “Oh no Anya, it seems that a few members of the household have gotten just a little bit porky!” Anya takes a moment to eye her own stomach with a questionable look in her eye, “So I’m taking measurements to send to the tailor~” She pauses, wrapping her tape around Anya’s doughy middle, “28!!” she barks at you, “W-Wait is this inches or millimeters?!” you whimper…

Up next, almost immediately a very disgruntled Anya stormed out of the room claiming that you peeked, your other, much more roly-poly maid waddled her way into the examination room. You couldn’t help but notice that she had a donut in her chubby white hands, no doubt another dose of Mika’s remedy, and powder all across her lips; once seeing you in the room she stopped cold, also seemingly embarrassed about having to change in front of you. Her face, all except her powdered lips, turned scarlet and she retreated to Suzu’s shoulder, hiding from your gaze. “Oh, what’s the matter sweetie?” she cooed, stroking the young maid’s fat back. Without even having to guess, you grumble and turn around. “Good Master~” Suzu coos, praising you like a puppy, “You’re learning!”

After completing the physical, Suzu opting to perform hers on her own, much to both your disappointment and euphoria, you left the room, the numbers and statistics swirling around in your brain. All those numbers, all those pudgier looking women in your employment. You wondered, for a moment, what impact you had on their waistlines. You wondered critically, querying whether or not it was your fault for them fattening up. With a resounding answer, you said “Yes, it was your fault.” Even if involuntary, even if subconsciously, it all came back to you.

You didn’t know whether to applaud yourself or slap yourself, but they didn’t seem to mind too much.

Except Anya.

“Hey, idiot!” You turned around at that moment to see Anya walking toward you, her hips swaying from side to side as her balled up fists squeezed into her pudgy palm. Her round face was unreadable. You weren’t certain whether she was glad to see you or wanted nothing more than to strangle you at that particular moment. Knowing Anya, you’d say she’d want the latter, but there was something off about the way she was walking, and it had nothing to do with the fact that her thighs were significantly thicker than usual. No, it was something subtler, something simpler, something more emotional.

“Hey, Anya,” you replied, nervously, unaware of what to possibly expect now.

“So, guess you got to see my naked body, huh? What, did you just beg Suzu to help you with the physicals?” Anya asked, her eyes narrowed dangerously.

“Huh? No! Not at all, she just pulled me in and I didn’t have a—”

“That’s what they all say,” Anya mumbled before her voice grew progressively more and more desperate, tears slowly forming in her eyes as she put all her energy into speaking, “Listen, you know I’ve been getting a little chubby now, right? Well, obviously you did; it’s all your fault anyway. Listen,—don’t speak, just listen—I was thinking it all through before, during the physicals and everything, and I have to just say something now or else it’s just gonna eat up my insides, a-a-and just kill me, okay? It’s gonna just kill me, and I know you’re not gonna feel the same way. I know how you feel toward Kate and everything, but if I don’t get this out, I’m gonna—gonna—gonna—” Tears began to stream down her chubby cheeks, cheeks filled with scarlet blush. Slowly, you wrap an arm around her soft shoulders, pulling her into an embrace, if not only to make her feel better.

“Just say it,” you said, “You don’t have to act so strong all the time, ya know?

Anya nodded against your chest. “I think I’m in love with you.”

There was a moment of silence as Anya’s words sank in. Love? Love with Anya? Could it really be? She was in love with you!? After all that teasing, all that shouting, all that abuse, could that have all been Anya trying to express her emotions, an emotion that, for all intents and purposes, she had never understood nor expressed so thoroughly before? Had she been afraid of it, perhaps terrified of the idea of opening herself up to another human being? Did that excuse the things she had done? No, but, judging by the tears Anya was shedding, she too didn’t think that her actions were nearly justified, and here she was, begging for forgiveness, regretting her sins.

But what about Kate?

“Listen,” Anya replied, brushing tears aside with slightly pudgy fingers, “I know you don’t feel the same way toward me, and all, but what do I have to do? I’ve never felt this way toward another human being, even an idiot like you! I don’t want to stop feeling this way. Seriously, I’ll do anything in the world! I’ll even—”

As the words left her lips, a smile creased yours; had Anya just offered to personally put an end to the silly feud between her and Kate? There was a slight silence, Anya’s temperament growing less and less stable with every passing second. “But, you hate Kate.” you say softly. “I know I do, jackass!” her features soften, “That should… that should really show you how much I care about you.”

You can’t help it, the smile on your faces stretches further and further until your cheekbones almost hurt, “Wh-What?!” she hollers, getting self defensive, “You’re laughing at me right, you really are a jerk!” Your embrace gets tighter, not to keep a squirming Anya hostage but to show how much you appreciated her great sacrifice, how much you appreciated getting poor reclusive Kate another friend. Even if it was an arrangement such as this, maybe they could really get along?

“N-No, I’m not laughing at you.” You almost giggle in your excitement. Anya catches your snickering, “Yes you are you big jerk!” she laughs too, her tears drying slightly as she plays cat and mouse with you once again, “Am not!” you can’t help but laugh now that Anya’s feeling just a little bit better. Against your better instinct, Anya’s face had gotten much closer to yours, something you didn’t notice until it was too late: you two shared something passionate.

Her soft lips grew closer and closer to yours, not wavering in the slightest as she narrowed in on you. Against your better judgment, you had done nothing to stop Anya’s campaign. Full lips touched yours, her delicate arms wrapped strongly around the base of your neck, and her eyelids lowered in her euphoria. Her breathing hastened, soft breath released against your chin as she broke away, and a different sort of redness had been painted onto her relaxed, almost lazy, expression. She had kissed you.

Anya gazed into your eyes for a few seconds, an almost hazy expression reflected in her bright eyes. But, perhaps realizing that her passion had gotten the better of her, Anya broke away suddenly. “I-I-I-“, she stammered, fearing retribution, “I-I-I… I better go talk to Kate, right?” she sighs warmly, glancing at you with a hopeful expression. “Y-Yeah, you should!” your tone comes out much more enthusiastic than intended, probably due to the heat of the moment.

She smiles at you, so excited that her smile becomes a grin; “Yeah, I should.” She coos, “Oh, and by the way Master?” you perk your head up slightly at her address, “You laugh like a retard.”

You decided to find somewhere quiet in hopes of some thinking time; being caught in a love triangle did that to a man. As you make your way to the study, your thoughts slowly fill the hallway. Thoughts of Anya, thoughts of Kate, thoughts of you and Anya and thoughts of you and Kate. But then again, you weren’t certain Kate felt the same, she didn’t give any confirmation after all. Who were you kidding, the way she looked at you, how she lit up when you gave her something sweet, the way she kept everything you gave her; Kate totally liked you. You couldn’t help but feel like a huge jerk.

Finally reaching the study, you push open the heavy doors and clamor about for the light switch. Finally finding it, you switch it to ‘on’ and remark on how extraordinary the room was. Bookshelves lined the walls, leaving enough room for a fireplace on one and the balcony on the other, knowing your Uncle Lucas they were probably related to the renaissance or something to that effect. Two chairs sat in front of the fireplace, two glasses sitting next to each other on the shared end table inbetween them. And at the back, just a few feet from the balcony’s arch, a desk with many strange brick-a-brack on it.

Sighing to yourself, you light a fire and bask in it’s warm glow…

You sat there for what had to feel like hours by that fire, though it couldn’t have been more than ten minutes. Really, it couldn’t have been. It was just the thoughts of those two girls swirling around in your head. Anya had kissed you. You could still feel her puckering lips against yours, pressing and caressing your sensitive mouth, inviting her warmth and excitement into your chest as you longed to probe her soft flesh with your fingers. Then, however, you saw Kate, her chubby cheeks drawing nearer as the imaginary albino in your mind kissed you too. You wondered, momentarily, whether or not there’d be much of a difference in the desire you felt toward them, but knew, in your heart, that Kate and Anya both wanted you.

“So, it was five o’clock, the house was still, and the young master was alone in his study soaking up the heat of the fire.” You turn around to see Suzu, a box of donuts in her hands, approach you. She was wearing a nurse’s outfit, where it became apparent to you that she had packed on the pounds. Her chubby arms trembled as she lowered herself down, her belly folding enough to fold the fabric carrying it. Her lips curled into a relaxed sort of grin, a laugh on her lips. “So how’re you, young master? Conflicted?”

“You don’t know the half of it.”

“Actually I do. I was in the room next to this one during your whole thing with Anya.” You blush deep red at this. She knew? Kate’s closest friend knew? With Suzu’s husky voice, you couldn’t tell whether Suzu was congratulating you on stealing what could have been Anya’s first kiss, or damning you for being unfaithful to Kate, despite the fact you weren’t in a relationship.

Right?

“Listen, Kate is a very fragile girl, you know,” Suzu replied, “Just the fact that you’re giving her attention that’s polite from someone who isn’t a male, well, it really helped her out a lot. You may not know it, but, before you came, Kate never seemed to really smile a lot. Well, now you’re here and she’s smiling all the time.”

“Which is exactly why I should be with her,” you said.

“Actually, that’s exactly why you shouldn’t.”

You glance over at Suzu, confused to say the least. “Wait, come again?”

“Surprised? Well, Anya has no problem with physical intimacy. The fact that she kissed you so soon after confessing her love proves she doesn’t just love your personality, which it’s clear that she does: she also loves your body, and wants to be with you on a physical level. Kate, however, is terrified by the idea of physical intimacy. She has a lot of baggage, and puberty or not, the idea of actually making love to anyone is just too much stress to her. If you truly love her, you’d spend the years it takes to rehabilitate her and allow her to be able to not have flashbacks when you make love, but the truth is that if your feelings were so strong, you would’ve resisted Anya entirely, which you didn’t. Don’t feel guilty, though, I know someone who has that patience, and you are not that person.”

Suzu’s words sink in slowly. You feel a tinge bit guilty, but then realize that Suzu is entirely right. You weren’t prepared for Kate. Though Kate had shot you glances of reverence several times in the past, never once had she touched you. But Anya had touched you so often. You remembered hearing that true love involved a union of both emotional AND carnal needs, and Kate was simply emotional. Anya, however, that was different. She wanted you to touch her, to stroke her arms and let her coo in delight. Did Kate want you to touch her? She’d feel claustrophobic, terrified, for all intents and purposes even a little terrified.

“Don’t stop being Kate’s friend, though,” Suzu said, “If you do, I’ll get Kate’s future lover to kick your ass.”

“Who is Kate’s future lover?” you ask, eyes narrowed as your lips are curled, suspiciously.

“Oh, uh—hey! Look! Dinner! Let’s head downstairs!” Suzu stammered, rising to her feet as she guided you downstairs, her now round cheeks deep scarlet.

“Nuh-uh!!” she cried the instant your hand was off of her chocolate stained mouth, “Mimi put her blood, sweat, and tears into that cake and Master had to make Mimi drop it!” she whined, “Mimi only got to eat some of it too, you big meanie!!” Feeling sorry for her, and desperate for the plan to work, you try to barter with your tiny chef. “Look, I just need your help today, just for a little bit!” you plead with her on your knees and hands folded out in front of you, “Just help me out and I’ll help you make a new Super Cake.”

“Wow! I haven’t gone to the theaters in years!” Anya stammered, eyes glowing as she took in the vision of each individual movie poster lined up along the wall. Gods of the art of film, all of them, in essence, and this was their temple. Here Anya was paying tribute, a sinner coming into confession for the first time in years. When you thought of it like that, things were even more adorable, as Anya’s round face, usually in control and confident, had turned to mush, reduced to the level of a child being presented with countless gifts at Christmas time.

And you were Santa Claus.

You both agreed, in the end, on avoiding the romantic comedy movie. Upon realizing that Anya was not a large fan of mushy stuff, you felt relief fill your chest. Sure, some romantic movies were good, but more often than not there was some ridiculous one that comes along that makes you cringe yet every girl goes to see, much to your awe. The weeks zoomed by, being with Anya made time much more intangible and much harder to grasp. Of course, maybe it was just your subconscious, blinded by the distinct possibility of love, that wouldn’t allow anything to burst your bubble. Whatever the case, you couldn’t remember the last time you had ever been so happy. And Anya was happy too; albeit her special brand of happy that included sarcasm, jealousy, and even downright hostility. Yep, everyone was happy… and fat.

“Mmmm…” Anya moaned, savoring the fluffy chocolate cake that had just passed her painted lips, “This is so good.” She mumbled, wiping her dainty mouth with a napkin. “What’d you call this again, Mimi?” she called out to the increasingly chubby dwarf in the kitchen, “Mimi’s Super Duper Chocolate Cake.” You answer for her, feeling a small shiver go up your spine as you remember the hard days of work it took to make that stupid cake just for Anya to inhale it in no time. “Oh that’s right!” she playfully slapped your shoulder with one pudgy hand, causing a chain reaction that reverberated in her soft upper arms, “You broke your back just to make your girlfriend a teensy bit wider!” she pushed another forkful past her full lips, ignoring the grumbling protests from her stuffed stomach. You laugh at her, “Hey if you don’t want it, give it back!” you tease faking her out by touching the side of her plate, “Oh no you don’t!” she giggled, moving the plate just out of reach, “You made it for me, it’s mine!”

Anya had put on an astonishing amount of weight in the short weeks you had been going out, not that you really minded as long as she was happy. The slender, redheaded maid that had loathed you so when you first took over the estate had slowly ballooned into your plump, snarky girlfriend; and to be honest it was getting harder and harder to remember what that skinny, unhappy girl looked like. She had a thick, juicy pair of thighs that brushed together with every step your maid took, wobbling slightly to match her killer caboose as it swayed back and forth underneath her skirt. Anya’s stomach, once slender though without tone, had slowly softened up into the big squishy apron that hung just a hair’s length above her crotch, ironically covered by a real apron during her shift. She had filled out rather evenly, even though her arms and cheeks grew much chubbier than her breasts. It had gotten to the point where Anya was outgrowing just about everything, down to one of Kate’s old uniforms from just a few months ago. But you loved your porky girlfriend, and that’s all that mattered.

"I can really see how you would enjoy having these little ciestas, Kate." Suzu struggles past the shadow of doubt to make idle conversation with the round apple of her eye, "I wouldn't mind having a few of these myself, if it meant I could catch up with you."

Anya giggled and squeezed your arm with her chubby hands, now oddly 'into' the operation since the minimal fruition. Silently, you hold a finger to your lips indicating for her to be quiet so as to not draw attention away from Suzu. It was remarkable how Kate listened to Suzu's every word, compliment or story, without so much as even touching her food. Sure, every now and then she would peck at her chicken cordon bleu, but Kate paid far much more attention to Suzu than any fattening treat.

Silently, Kate's doubley chinned face grew happier and happier as her old friend went on about almost nothing, apparantly Suzu had been withdrawing from Kate due to her feelings of awkwardness. She offered Suzu one of her sides, only for Suzu to turn it down; "Oh, no thank you Kate, I'm already far too big for my tastes." she chuckles nervously, hands shaking so much that she couldn't even take a sip of her coffee. Kate looks down and grabs her lowermost roll, jostling it as if to say; "Yeah, you're big~" Noticing this, Suzu responded with a smile, "Yeah, you're right; gimme that."

You and and ecstatic Anya were not the only ones watching, however, as Mimi's eyes examined the situation in front of them with just as much glee. "This is going gweat!!" she whispered, "Now for Mimi's Cutesy Ootsey Strawberry Shortcake with a Lovenote Inside!" the nearly spherical dwarf wobbles awkwardly over to the counter, dragging a platter far bigger than herself off of it and onto a dolley, wheeling it into the dining area.

Immediately Mimi catches your eyes, most notably the malicious twinkle in her eyes as she wheeled the mighty confection towards the table. "Oh no..." you mutter, knowing full well what was going on, "Mimi's gonna mess it up!" you turn to Anya for support, but she is lost in the visual embrace of Mimi's Cutesy Ootsey Strawberry Shortcake. "Aww, how sweet Mimi!" Anya cooes, "You made this for me and the retard, didn't you?!" Mimi snorts, "Sh'yeah, right, Mimi'll focus on you two later." she teases; hand on one of her chins as she tried to remember which slice had the love note in it...

"Oh yeah!" she chirps aloud, grabbing the distinct slice and putting onto Kate's plate, "Here ya go Katie-Kate!" she pats the obese maid's swollen stomach, "From Suzu~"

The framed doctor turns to you, a betrayed look in her eye. It was almost as if to say, "I swear, I had nothing to do with this!"

Not long after devouring her slice, Kate notices that something in her mouth doesn't taste quite right. It wasn't shortcake, it wasn't sugar, it wasn't anything remotely creamy... it tasted like paper! She pulled a tiny scroll from her mouth, and silently gasped as she read the no doubt disgustingly erotic message that it displayed. She turned to Suzu, and back to the note, and then back to Suzu as she pushed herself away from the table; struggling to stand and waddles out of the room with silent tears, leaving Suzu heartbroken.

"Wow!" Mimi giggles, "I didn't think she'd rush off to get her ballgag and leather tights that quickly!!"
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Relationship Status minus, like, a million

choices: Mimi manages to help Kate, and she trusts Suzu again...new romantic plan...
Kate isn't helped, and Suzu continues her downward spiral...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
A week passed after that day, and you could see before your eyes the great change that occurred during those days. Suzu had remained in the kitchen constantly, shooting Mimi fierce, cruel looks of utter fury, much to the girl's general confusion. You had to explain to the woman how her attempt to "help" had only resulted in even more frustration and more pain than was logical and reasonable. Kate avoided everyone that week, choosing to remain in her quarters, her massive frame hidden in the shadows.

Although it's impossible to gorge yourself to obesity over the course of a week, Suzu did expand slightly as she drowned her sorrows, no, smothered her sorrows, in food. She had once been a strong woman, almost an amazon, but that had been, for lack of a better word, a lifetime ago. She was now a pudgy nurse, tears streaming down her plump cheeks on a regular basis, cheeks growing rounder at a steady yet constant rate.

"I'm worried about her," Anya confessed as you were laying on a couch, her round face leaning against your chest, "Suzu, I mean. Look, she's all depressed and everything, so maybe we should try to do something to help out with Kate."

Mimi walked into the room, her large belly swaying side to side as she plopped herself down beside them, the sofa sagging under her weight. It might have buckled under her bulk, but Anya and yourself weighed it down more. She held her head in her hands, glancing down regretfully at the floor. "Mimi tries to help, and all that comes out is just nothing. Aw....."

"Stop feeling sorry for yourself!" Anya snapped, "Look, you are so damn dense, aren't you!? Don't you realize that you don't know if Kate would like reading that smut you wrote her?"

"It's not smut, it's rom--"

"No, romance is being hugged by someone and treated to something good, or when you feel all lovey dovey with someone, NOT when you write them some smutty shitty junk!" Anya snapped, her face turning as red as her hair. Mimi shrunk away, genuine tears running down her cheeks now as she stared in awe at the large, imposing figure of Anya. "Tell Kate what you did, make sure she knows Suzu's innocent, alright!? And if you don't do it, so help me God, I will kick your ass!"

Mimi nodded, briefly, before darting off, hastily. Anya sighed as she snuggled against your chest. "That might make things a little better..."
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Suzu's Decline

choices: Delegate, shut her up, and skip to a romantic late-night garden scene
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
A few hours later, outside Kate's quarters, you and Anya await the diminiative chef's return. Your girlfriend huffs, pulling her hands from her hips and crossing her arms as she tilt her round body to the left, "What could she be doing in there?" she whines, "This was supposed to be my time off, I wanna clean my half of the room!" This managed to break the tension a little, as you raise an eyebrow questionably at her idea of time off. "You clean your room when you're not working?" Realizing what you were driving at, Anya exhales in an irritated fashion, "I'm the head maid, duh, I couldn't live with myself if my room wasn't tidy." You accidently let out a small laugh at her delegation, to which she responds with a quick pop to the head.

"DON'T LAUGH AT MY DISORDERS!!"

Your lover's feud was cut short by Mimi, awkwardly hefting her rotund little body out of the doorway; you couldn't help but notice that the tray she had come in with was missing. "Well?" Anya demands, "How'd it go?" The obese dwarf kicks her adorably chubby foot out ashamedly, avoiding eye contact with you or your portly head maid. "Well, Kate liked the brownies Mimi brought her, but she didn't say so- (to which Anya nudged you lightly and quipped, "No shocker there.") -but I did get her to agree to... someting elwse..." she exaggerated the babyish drawl in her final words in hopes for some pity...

And so she delegated; Mimi had gotten Kate to agree to meet her in the garden. While it took a little convincing, thus the brownies, Mimi had calmly said that Suzu had nothing to do with the note. In fact, in her own baby-speak, Mimi had explained everything about the situation that had unfolded so far. About Suzu, her feelings, and her depression following Mimi's attempts to help. Unfortunately for Mimi, Kate didn't quite get the whole story, due to the mini-chef's motor mouth; to which Mimi was well aware of and decided to work it to her advantage. Regardless, Kate would be at that garden. Lest Mimi be forced to bribe her.

You and Anya exchange confused glances, "Okay, so we get her into the garden, then what?" Anya asks impatiently. A mischevious grin spreads across Mimi's chubby cheeks, creasing her lowermost chins. Her monster-belly jiggled as she pointed to you enthusiastically, "Master gets Suzu into that same garden!!" she touts...

You curse Mimi under your breath for voulenteering you for this little mission; Suzu already had a malicious side to her, you couldn't imagine how horrible it would be if you got involved in another fiasco like last time. You poke your head into the kitchen, which had become her home away from home since Sunday, and catch you depressed doctor in mid-feast.

Thick tear tracks run down her chubby cheeks, their freshness hinted at by her puffy eyes and broken sobbing. With a padded hand she grabs at her utensil, scooping out another spoonful of sweet fattening comfort food to push past her lips so that they may rest on her expanding frame. Her hair, usually kept neat and tidy, was allowed to fall wherever it may, which just so happened to be very unflattering to her rounded face. She sniffles solemnly and in a broken voice she beckons, "I know you're there... you're not very good at hiding."

Having been seen, you emerge from the doorway with some hesitation; not quite sure how you were to deal with Suzu in this state. "H-Hi Suzu..." you stammer, trying your best to seem informal while you take a seat beside her, "How's it-"

"You know damned well how I'm going." she spits back through a mouthful of toffee flavored icecream, "That short little bitch ruined my life!" Immediately you try to play mediator, "Suzu, you don't understand, she-"

"Oh I think I understand!" she barks back at you, "In fact, I know damned well that I understand. I'm a doctor, remember?!" she had you there, "It just goes to show you that I wasn't meant to be happy; I was meant to be lonely, miserable, and depressed!" You instinctively try to comfort her with a soft hand to hold hers, but she pulled away; inadvertantly causing her taught blouse to pop one its uppermost buttons. "And FAT." she concludes in a self-loathing bellow, shoving another spoonful into her mouth as the word "fat" passed her lips.

"Suzu, come on." you attempt self confidence, it worked with Anya after all, "You weren't meant to be miserable, and if you'll just listen I think I can hel-"

"Oh, you think you can help me?!" Suzu barks at you in her displaced anger, "You want to HELP me; fire that midget who cooks this fattening crap and it'll solve two problems!!" you exhale sharply, obviously this wasn't the route to go with a woman as headstrong as Suzu. "Look, Kate wants to-"

"OH AND KATE!!" she raises her flabby arms in mock astonishment, "Think of poor Kate in all this, scared shitless of who used to be her best friend in the whole wide world, who's she gonna turn to now?!"

"Suzu, just listen and-"

"No, I'm done listening, I've decided that I'm just going to quit." she raises her hands defensively, "I'll find a practice to work with, I can take it, I'm a big girl!" the dumpy doctor says furiously, "And whenever Mimi decides to apoligize, she's gonna have to make an appointment and spend $300 dollars to-"

"SUZU!!" you shout, "SHUT. UP."

And for once, surprisingly, it worked...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Operation: SuzuxKate (redux)

choices: "She said yes."
"She said no."
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
It took you all of fifteen minutes to explain the situation to her. Suzu stared at you with wide eyes, eyes filled with awe, frustration, and, in the end, simple bliss. It was shocking how such a usually intimidating woman was now so docile before you, so simple and calmed down, staring up at you with a placid sort of expression on her face. It was shocking this could possibly be the same individual from several days before. Glancing over at you, a soft expression on her round face, she asked, simply, "You did this all just for me?"

"Pretty much, yeah," you replied, hastily, "Now, c'mon! We have to get you a little ready for later, right?"

Anya helped Suzu fix herself up. Naturally, the lines of tears running down her pudgy cheeks were swept away, but then there were other things, such as her frayed hair spiraling all over the place, her clothing disarrayed and messy. It hung off her body, but her now plump frame, for better or worse, held her clothing tightly across her bust and frame.

Finally, after preparing the girl, Suzu walked toward the spot prepared for her. You watched from afar as Suzu passed by Mimi, giving her a venomous glare which made the plump, rolly-polly girl tremble in fear, recoiling as she held her hands and arms out before her, protectively. The far larger nurse (larger in height, not girth) gave her a fearsome glance before walking off, her entire body trembling as she neared her designated location.

"Do you think she'll be okay?" you asked Anya, anxiously.

"Eh, I think so," Anya replied, "Though she's probably extremely nervous."

Suzu's knees buckled occassionnally under her as she neared her destination, and waited. You watched from afar as Kate's round form approached her, and they spoke. Seconds passed like hours as you felt yourself drawn into their conflict, their plight, despite the fact you couldn't hear a word they were saying. Mimi craned her neck to hear them, but Anya dragged her back by her hair, tugging her into the ground. At one point, Mika attempted to eavesdrop, but due to her massive frame, she utterly failed at being stealthy, and Anya, once again, pulled her by her hair into the nearest pond.

Finally, after an eternal five minutes, Suzu approached you, her face expressionless. Was this a sign of rejection, or of utter shock that Kate accepted her. your throat and mouth dry, you finally asked "So, uh, how did it go?"
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Kiss and Make Up

choices: You wake up in the morning with Suzu nowhere to be found
You wake up in the morning with Kate nowhere to be found
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
"So, uh, how did it go?"

Suzu's head remained expressionless, and she just walked between you and Anya. "Suzu? What happened, what did she say?" you ask Suzu. She doesn't reply, but marches towards Mimi with an air of anger about her. You see Suzu's mouth contort into something from a monster movie, and resist the urge to cover your ears as she screams in Mimi's face.

"I HATE YOU!!! You have ruined EVERYTHING!!! Goddammit...." As the curse fell from Suzu's mouth, she broke into a blood curdling cry and shoved Mimi away in her pursuit of her room. You can't help but stare, nor go and comfort her, as you realize communication would be impossible for a long time. "My god...poor Suzu." mutters Anya next to you. "Yeah. What are we going to do?" you say to Anya.

"What do you mean we? It's all Mimi's fault! She's the one needs to fix this, and quick!" stated Anya. Mimi looked to the two of you with a speechless expression.

"Wittle ol' me, try to say sowwy to that banshee? HA! Nooo way..."

Anya glared at Mimi, and you did the same. "Mimi, I'm sorry but you really screwed this up. Alot..."

"We'll try and assist you but-" Anya cuts you off by silencing you with her palm. "Quiet, Kate is coming!" You all shut your mouths as you watch the swaying figure of Kate appear in the doorway. Tears could clearly be seen on her soft cheeks, fresh and painful. All you want is to take her in a big hug to squeeze away the hurt, but now wouldn't be the time. Kate briefly glances at you and quickly makes her way by the three of you. You just watch until Kate rounds the corner to her quarters. Your not completely sure, but you swear you can hear quiet sobbing coming from the hall Kate went through.

"Damn...I guess I really messed up, huh..." said Mimi with more than a hint of regret in her voice. All you and Anya can do is nod at her statement, which activates the Mimi tear program.

" *sniff*...It's all my fault!!! Why oh why did I have to write that stupid little note! Agghhh...."

All you can do is sigh at seeing Mimi like this, all sad and quivering. You move down and put your arm around her plump arms. "Hey ,hey. It'll all work out, I know it will! We will get those two to be together, although, not right now. It's getting pretty late. Shall we?"

You lead the way to the main hall where you depart from the weeping Mimi. As you and Anya make your way upstairs, she motions for you to stop.

"This is really bad! What's up with Kate? I thought for sure she would've said yes?!" You don't know the answer yourself, and just shrug your shoulders.

"I know we will have to repair the damage done by Mimi, but could we discuss it in the morning? I'm really tuckered out." Anya seems annoyed at you for putting off brainstorming, but eventually smirks at you. "Yep, just be a lazy dummy! I will see you in the morning, oh humble master." Anya makes a mock bow and you can't help but smile. "Trust me, we will figure this out!" You embrace in a kiss before finally making your way to your bedroom, thinking over what events tomorrow will bring.....
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Ruined Love

choices: No, wait... is that Kate crying?
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
"And another thing!" Anya scolded you down the hallway, "I bought you an alarm clock specifically for the purpose of waking you up, not to lull you back to bed!" You chuckle slightly in your half-sleep, "Oh come on Anya, it's only 8:30, it's not like I slept 'til noon or anything!" you rebute only for her to huff and pout in the other direction, "It's a good thing you didn't too, I'd punch you so hard we'd have to put you in Urgent Care." You share a mildly amused laugh, though yours seemed much more cautious; you knew she was serious!

After finally reaching the dining hall, Anya stopped at the doorway, "Hey, you think Suzu's in there?" she asked, "I mean, last night was pretty rough on her and all... what should we do?" Remembering her last bout with depression, you were fairly certain that she would be somewhere near food, "Don't worry, we'll see how she's feeling before we talk to her." Anya scowls, "I don't think I've ever seen that woman cry before, and now... it's waterworks all the time!" she says quietly, turning away in thought, "I mean, she's such a strong woman y'know, I feel so bad for her..."

You put a hand on her shoulder, to which she turns around for you to give her a big hug. "Hey, come on, we'll get her and Kate through this." the weighty redhead smiles, lips stretching across her doubley-chinned face. "You better, if Kate quits I'm not taking up her share of the housework around here."

"I thought you said all Kate ever did was eat all day?" you ask coyly

"Exactly, I'd blow up like a pufferfish!"

Both of you laugh at the (not too far off) thought as you take your leave from the hall and enter the dining room; Suzu nowhere to be seen. "Huh, maybe she's in the kitchen?" you say aloud as Anya takes her seat at the table. Just by peeking your head into the doorway, your suspicions were proven wrong. The only person there was Mimi, toiling away over a huge cake that read 'SOWWY' in bright orange frosting. "Oh, hiya Master!" the tiny woman puts down her icing gun to waddle over to you and embrace your lower half in a big squishy hug, "Sowwy 'bout breakfast, Mimi'll get right on it!"

A little wary at Suzu's absence, things seemed a little awkward just by being with Mimi. "Thanks Mimi, Anya'll start swinging if she doesn't get some food in her." you joke... well, halfway joke, "Actually, I was wondering if you'd seen Suzu, she isn't out at the table and she isn't in here... is she, y'know, okay?" Even while bending over to get some pans for a lightning-quick breakfast, you can see the bounce fade in Mimi's step. "No, Mimi hasn't seen Suzu all morning..." she says solemnly, "But that's why Mimi's making this Extra Special Please Forgive Me Chocolate Cake!" you eyeball the confection questionably, "Mimi, I think one of Suzu's problems is her self esteem... maybe chocolate cake the size of a table isn't the way to go..."

"So, was she in there?" Anya asks from her seated position, no doubt waiting patiently as possible for her breakfast and your return. "No, she wasn't..." you mumble, "Hey, Anya?" she perks up at your melancholy expression, "You think it would be okay if I skipped breakfast just this once, I wanna make sure Suzu's okay." The volatile vixen doesn't even mess with you like usual, "Sure thing, you go make sure she's okay... but I expect lunch with my boyfriend, my tummy needs company!"

So, naturally, you started your search for Suzu in her office. She was always an early bird, so it was concievable that even in her current state she would be working. As you crack the door, you see that the lights are off. You poke the intercom, nothing. You make sure to check every nook and cranny in her workplace before heading to your next location... her room.

Panting heavilly after trekking the entire household in search of Suzu's quarters, you already feel emptiness pouring out of the room. Ignoring your feelings of doubt, you quietly creep into the doctor's room; remarkably similar to your own, minus the bathroom and balcony, and adding a few dozen bookshelves with medical journals. Searching around a bit proved fruitless, rummaging through her knicknacks proved useless, and checking under her bed was just stupid ("like she could fit under the bed!") Without much else of a choice, your search leads you to Kate; maybe the two had reconciled and she had spent the night with the obese object of her affection?
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: The Search for Suzu

choices: Mika drives you to the airport... yay?
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
After walking, yet again, to the complete other side of the house you find yourself at a familiar door; Anya and Kate's room, as you preferred that name rather than the 'Maid Quarters'. You knock, not only going without response but it seemed that this room was empty too! That couldn't be, had- had Kate and Suzu actually run away? Well, as long as they were together you guessed... wait, was that... crying?

It was incredibly faint, like someone was crying with cotton in their mouths, but you could just barely make out incredibly silent bawling. No doubt Kate, if it was this quiet. You turn the doorknob, old and antiquey, to leave the door alightly ajar. "Kate?" you say softly, "Can I come in?"

It wasn't totally dark, the windows were open and everything. And even in the dark, Kate's pajamed body was so pale it would probably have been easy to make her out. The poor engorged girl was crying, clutching to a stuffed animal with her fat grip. Her eyes darted to you, shocked that anyone had come up to see her. Without saying a word, her broken expression nodded 'yes'. And you followed her request, sitting down right beside her . Suzu could wait, Kate was obviously hurting.

Your interaction with Kate had been limited since sparking your relationship with Anya, mostly due to a mutual awkwardice that you couldn't seem to shake. As such, you hadn't really gotten close to Kate in a very long time. Meaning you hadn't seen the magnitude of her increasingly high weight up close. She had gotten huge, slowly climbing her way almost into Mika's initial class. Her pale skin bulged out of her too-tight pajamas, belly pouring into her lap, and her rearend providing a gigantic cushion. However happy she may have been to see you, her permenately dimpled cheeks would not flash a smile, for the ordeal with Suzu had proved far too much for her child-like demeanor to handle.

"Hey Kate." you say with a soft enthusiasm, "How're you feeling?" she shakes her head 'no', breaking out into more quiet sobs. Your mute maid was broken on the inside, even before Mimi's intervention, now things were just so much worse...

Without saying a single word, you embrace her; something you should have done since the beginning, not spoil her, not avoid her. Just hug her. Your arms squish the flab on her torso, her huge breasts pressing agasint eachother and up against her padded collarbone. You expected her to freak out, "afraid of physical intimacy" was what Suzu called her, but no; she just accepted the hug. In fact, much to your surprise, she broke away only to turn back to you and lock your smaller frame into a tight hug of your own. So you just sat there for a long time, hugging this poor obese girl as she sobbed quietly into your shoulder...

And even though you weren't the one torn up on the inside, Kate's pain rubbed off on you as you choked back small salty droplets of your own...

You lead the portly maid by the hand to the kitchen, after making sure to leave the room so she could get into her new elastic uniform, having the compassion to give the poor girl the day off. "Boy, Anya's gonna be pissed..." you think to yourself, imagining the horrible atrocities your battleaxe plumper of a girlfriend would commit if she knew that only one maid would get to slack off. You put Mimi in charge of her (against your better judgement) and tell her to keep an eye on her. If she started crying, Mimi was to be right there to comfort her.

There was only one place left to check in this whole damned estate, and that was the security cameras in Mika's gazebo office. You enter the lawn ornamentation, greeted by the somewhat neglected overgrown guard with a big squishy hug. "YOU CAME TO VISIT ME?!" Mika wails as she crushes you in her mighty grip, "AW!!"

"Mika... can't... breath..."

"Oh, right, sorry~" the mighty woman giggles as she puts you down, "So what's up?" she asks casually, "You almost never come out to my neck of the woods."

"Suzu's not anywhere in the house, so I was wondering if I could check your surveillance cameras to... y'know, see where she might have gone?" you delegated to her, responding with a somewhat dumb expression. "But Master, you don't need to check the cams!" she said childishly, "'Cause Suzu left about three hours ago!" Ironically enough, three hours ago was two hours past eight thirty (ie: one hour after you were suppossed to be up and running the estate) No time to worry about that now though, you may have caught a lead to where Suzu might be!

"Mika, did she say where she was going?!" you spit the words out frantically. Mika put a flabby finger on her lowermost chin in deep thought, "Well, she had her breifcase... and that trapper keeper... oh, and a plane ticket."

"A PLANE TICKET?! you holler, "WHY DIDN'T YOU STOP HER?!"

"Well, she already paid for the ticket, and you can't just refund those!" she answered childishly, "I thought I'd be doing her a favor by letting her go, that's almost her whole paycheck, right there!"

"I gotta get to the airport!" you start running down the driveway like a lunatic, only for Mika to stop you with a flabby hand. "MIKA!!" you holler frantically, "Don't be silly Master, you'll never get there on foot... I'll drive you!"

Your expression of haste and great worry was replaced... with one of great fear and distress.
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: The Search for Suzu goes on...

choices: You manage to convince Suzu back to the house, things may just go back to normal
Suzu is deadset on leaving, but not after saying her goodbyes to you...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
An hour. An hour of reckless driving with complete and total abandon for any road rules or laws that had been established. An hour of cursing at neighboring cars, high speed races that had been "challenged", and an hour of Mika behind the wheel. You start to doubt if you'd ever get to the airport in time to catch Suzu's flight. But sure enough, Mika's reckless driving may have saved your ass; all planes were docked ... for now. "ThanksMikawaitformeherebye!" you speed towards the front door, knocking several aspiring passengers out of the way in your desperation.

You work your way to the Informations Desk, not really sure why you even bothered to check there first. "Hey, have you seen a really tall, really blonde woman?!" you must have looked horrible, sweating bullets and panting loudly. "Um...." the plump indian woman behind the counter stammered, "C-Could you be more specific sir, we get flights from Sweden and I think you-"

You cut her off, not having a moment to spare if she didn't know where Suzu was. Frantically, like a jackrabbit on speed, you run laps around the airport. Your feet hurt, your chest feels like it's on fire, but once you find Suzu she'd probably have a pill for that. "SUZU?!" You try A1, no answer, "SUZU?!" you make it all the way to F5, still no answer. "SUZU?!!?!" you holler into the woman's bathroom, "SUZU??!" you try the food court. Nothing. But that doesn't mean you'll stop running, even if it means-

And your sililoquey was cut short as you rammed into someone. Not a security gaurd, as your behavior would have suggested, but someone soft. Someone who reeked of coffee... someone with... really huge boobs to act as a wonderful airbag. "Ah!!" she fell backwards onto her padded rearend, dropping all of her belongings to the shiny tiled floor of the airport. "Watch where you're going you maniac!"

"I'm so sorry ma'am, I-I'm just looking for a friend." you clammor up all the scattered possesions for her; a briefcase, a first-class plane ticket, and... a trapper keeper? It seemed a little odd for a grown woman to carry around a trapper keeper. You look to the floor, picture had apparantly fallen out of said keeper face down on the floor. You pick up the photograph, a tall, tanned, amazon woman with a porcelain white maid, with an old man who you couldn't quite place... "Suzu?" you repeat, hopefully for the last time today...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: IsThe Search for Suzu Fruitful?

choices: Stupid Character Limit...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
Your gaze slowly travels upwards from the photograph to the woman you sent toppling over. She was dressed in a concealing overcoat and her illfitting regular garments underneath, but there was no mistake about it; this woman was your friend. "S-Suzu!" the name sounds so much more meaningful now that she was right in front of you, "I know, I know, I heard it all in the women's restroom; help me up?" she said sarcastically, heaving and ho'ing her portly frame about. Seeing her in distress, you outstretch your hand for her to grab; something which she begrudgingly accepts as necessary...

But unfortunately you, your pathetic might was nowhere near enough to lift Suzu's impressive statue and girth from the polished tiles of the airport. To make matters worse, you were sent tumbling to the ground alongside her! Since this is a harem piece, your face landed inbetween her impressive coatpuppies, and likewise because this is an FA piece, the rest of you landed on her soft squishy body. One hand locked onto hers, while the other one shamelessly groped one of her stray lovehandles. Her soft skin brushed against yours as you were brought nearly cheek to cheek, noses a mere centimeter apart. And to make matters worse, against your better instincts and judgements you noticed a peculiar bulge in your pants.

"Oh Master, I knew you were a letch but I never imagined you liked 'em tall dark chubby lesbo." she teased, much to your distaste.

"WILL YOU CUT THAT OUT?!"

Without moving you from your perched position, Suzu chuckles, "Oh come on now, I was only lightening the tension." she smiles solemnly at you, "You don't want me to go, do you?" she asks. Of course, your answer is no; "Of course I don't, Suzu, you're one of my best friends!" Her smile grows wider, yet sadder still.

"I know, and you've become special to me too." she says, stroking one of your red-hot cheeks with her chubby hand, "After all the times I've messed with you, even threatened you over Kate, and all the free labor I've squeezed out of you, despite your debaucherous intentions ("WHAT DEBAUCHEROUS INTENTIONS?!") you've still become someone so very dear to me." Suzu visibly chokes up a bit, "But that part of my life is over, I can't go back there while Kate still hates me."

"But Suzu, she doesn't hate you!" you try to reason with her, ignoring the growing crowd of people swarming around you, "She's just-" Suzu cuts you off, "Please, don't make this any harder than it has to be; I'm going and that's all there is to be said about it." She sniffles, a tear rolling down her chubby cheek, "But for what it's worth, for the past few months your time at the estate has made me very happy; It's made all of the girls very happy, and I'm so sorry that it has to come to this." Suzu pauses to reach past her busom and give you a motherly kiss on the forehead, "But as long as Kate and I aren't getting along, there's no reason for me to be there."

Intense throbbing fills your head, her words don't seem to reach you as anger fills your veins and rage boils your brain. Your face visibly darkens, and your lips feel incredibly dry all of the sudden. "No." you order, "You're not going, that's that." Suzu's head jumps back slightly in surprise, "You can't tell me what to do, I don't work for you anymore!" she retorts, "I've already paid for my plane ticket, I'm getting far far away from you and Kate and ALL OF MY PROBLEMS!!"

SMACK.

Your hand throbs in rthym to Suzu's aching cheek. The crowd explodes in protest and uproar, but your accumulated rage deafens you to their cries. "GROW UP." you bark, "Wh-What?" Suzu asks, scared stiff of you and your upstaged palm, "You heard me, GROW UP." you repeat, "I'm NOT letting you go for such a STUPID reason."
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: The Heated Farewell

choices: Three months have passed, we'll see how things (and people) have changed!
Things fall apart without Suzu!!!
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
"You think you can just go away, go away to somewhere where your problems don't hurt?" you pry apart her flopping boobs and climb her stomach to meet her face to face, "You think you can just run away, well you can't; You said it yourself, Kate needs you, you're the ONLY one she talks to in that whole household. So you're just going to up and leave her like that? Well you can't, because I'm not LETTING YOU." Beneath you, Suzu's mighty bulk squirms and wiggles, "Th-this is crazy, if I want to go, I'll GO!" she cries, flailing you about fruitlessly.

Like a leech, you had wriggled your way around Suzu's spare tire and clamped down; you weren't going anywhere. She kicked, and she flailed, she even accidentally knocked out a woman from the onlooking crowd with a kicked off stray shoe. But it was all useless, she was far from the athletic woman she once was; and the currently out of shape Suzu didn't have nary the energy to buck you off. "THIS. IS. STUPID!!" she hollered, arching her back and lifting her entire expanse up into the air, "GET OFF!!" but you only grabbed harder, completely lost in your desperation to keep such a close friend.

Soon enough, Suzu was left a sweating jiggling mass, still wearing you as a belt of defeat. Again, you climbed her expanse; "You know.... this isn't... a very... adult way... of handling things..." Suzu wheezed, only for you to lock her into the biggest hug you could muster. Without words, she understood. She understood your desperation, your fear, and your desire to keep such a tightly knit friendship- no a "family" of sorts- together. "So, what do you say, Suzu?" you ask, your own eyes tearing up a little...

There was silence. Between you, Suzu, and the crowd, there was complete and total quietness that eeked out to the rest of the airport...

"Give 'im a chance!" a woman called from the crowd
"He obviously wants you back!" another cheered
"Cut the guy a break!" a distinctly male voice cried
"Take it off!" a senile gentleman catcalled
"Yeah... wait, what?"

"Yes... I'll stay." Suzu smiled warmly at you, returning your hug with a big squishy embrace. The crowd roared, you smiled and laughed as you looked your portly nurse in the face; she smiled too...

"Just after my trip to the Bahamas."

"WHAT?!" you shouted, releasing yourself from the hug. You and another man from the crowd pried Suzu's girth from the ground, hoping to get some answers. "Well yeah, I already paid for the ticket; so why not enjoy myself?" she giggled, only for you to start chasing her around the airport "SO YOU GET TO GO TO THE BAHAMAS WHILE I STAY HERE AND WORK?!"

"Hire a temp!" she called, waddling about with surprising speed, "You'd only be gone for about three months!"

"THREE MONTHS??!?!" Your pace quickens as you catch up to the jogging fatty in front of you, "Oh come on, this is my first holiday ever!" she snickers, beding over to catch her long lost breath, "What do you say we eat some of this nasty airport food, I'm starved!" she gives you her patendent "breast squeeze please" stance and watches you squirm, "Your treat?"

"WHY DO I HAVE TO PAY?!"

"Because I spent all my money on my ticket~"

You look at her, she looks at you. Your bond has increased so much from this significant ten minutes of wrestling about on the floor and slapping her big fat cheek. You both smile, "Yeah, I guess... just this once though!"

So you spent the meager two hours you had left together. Suzu downed five pizzas at your expense, you bought her a book to read on the plane, and you both said your rather misty-eyed goodbyes. It would be three long months before you would see Suzu again, and you had resigned yourself to that fact; she needed time to collect herself and get back on her feet. in a strange mixture of happiness and melancholy, you made you way back to the parking lot to discover that Mika had forgotten about you in leiu of fast food and a nap back at her post. It would be four hours before Anya remembered that you had skipped their lunch, and she came to pummel you/pick you up.

After a three month stay in the Bahamas, Suzu had to admit she was starting to feel a little homesick, so when the taxi pulled into the estate, she felt relieved to finally be returning to her ‘home’. She had a wonderful time in her personal solitude and it certainly showed on her tan…and on her figure.

Suzu hadn't even noticed it until she noticed her pants were feeling just a tad loose.

The taxi pulled up and stopped right outside the main doors and Suzu took her first look at her master's home…and at once saw that something was wrong. Suzu could've been forgiven for mistaking Mika for someone else, but right away she could tell things had certainly changed around here. Standing in the dreary weather with an umbrella was a much slender Mika….well at least relatively slender her standards at least. At her last weigh in Suzu recalled, Mika weighted at least alot more than she did now. Mika looked like she had been staved out of a third of her weight.

Opening the door herself, Suzu heaved out of the back seat and onto her feet, and got a good look at the security guard.

“Mika, is that you?” Suzu asked at once.

“Yes!” Mika was shocked at being unrecognizable “Oh course it's me! Who else do you think…?”

“I’m sorry…but what happened to you?”

The usually bubbly – and morbidly obese – security guard frowned as she knew what Suzu really talking about.

“It's a long story…” Mika started “come inside and I’ll fill you in”

Without waiting any longer in the rain, the two of them walked inside to...
