****

Saying Kate had not taken Suzu's exodus well would be an understatement. Aside from being the only soul she trusted utterly, Kate blamed her own actions for Suzu's decision. After learning that Suzu was merely vacationing and allowing a week to pass, she was doing better, but still rather tender. Since she would rarely speak to you, the only thing you could do was quietly sit next to her in bed grasping her hand for support as she leaned against you.

There was nothing sexual about it, you were relieved to say. After choosing Anya, your relationship with Kate had become more brother-sister then potential lovers. You offered comfort in the gloom of Kate's room and nothing more. Fortunately, Anya understood this and, if not exactly happy with the situation, didn't ride your ass. Too much.

A creak and flash of light announced Anya's appearance. Turning to tell Kate goodbye, you noticed that she had fallen asleep, her tear streaked face at peace. You gently lowered her onto the bed and quietly exited the room with your plump girlfriend.

"Poor Kate. You know she wakes up crying at night? Suzu leaving really did a number on her..."

"Yeah, but she'll be back soon...ish. How'd the tour go?"

Anya's face soured. "Ok, for the most part. I don't like that Kara woman. I think she's comin' on to you. I didn't pork up just to have some skinny skank take you away from me. And one of them pinched my butt. And my side. I think we got another lesbo on our hands."

"Did you see who it was?"

"Hell no, whaddya think, I was walking backwards? I have no idea which one it was. Don't think it's Kara, though. She's only after rich, stupid men."

"I might be stupid, but there's one thing I know." You drew Anya close. "I'm the only one allowed to grope your ass. Or your lovehandles."

You gave each a loving squeeze causing Anya to squeal.

"You keep that up, I might just have to revoke your privileges!"

****

With the new help, things settled into a semblance of normality. Though no one could do as good a job as Suzu, three could make an adequate replacement. Veronica's enthusiasm only lasted for the first couple of days and her more laid back nature asserted itself. She was soon burrowed in the warmth of the kitchens, helping Mimi with maintenance and general cookery. With a partner in crime, Mimi soon put the catastrophe she engineered out of her mind and began cooking five star meals again, often using the lazy black haired lass as a test subject.

Betsy's enthusiasm, in contrast, only intensified. Within a week, she was zooming along the halls, dusting, polishing, vacuuming and whatever other little chore there was to do. She filed. She organized. She spellchecked. A constant cheery presence, she spread good cheer in what was a very dour house. Though initially wary, most of the girls in the house quickly grew to enjoy her presence, even if Anya found it wearing.

Kara found herself work in Suzu's office and would take every available opportunity to flirt with you making Anya livid. After dragging you into the office and explaining to the girl about your relationship, Anya silently fumed every time you went into the room. True, Suzu had done much of the same but Suzu was Suzu, not some upstart newcomer.

All in all, if things weren't doing wonderful, at least they were satisfactory.
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: You break away in leiu of checking on Kate, lea...

choices: Onward to a surely fattening... wait, Fudge Covered Chocolate Chip Pancakes?
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
"Good morning sir!" Betsy Franklin chirps as she shoves her freckled face into yours, "I've got your coffee on the table, your paperwork for today all stacked up for you, and a new healthcare plan that needs your John Hancock here, here, and here; I'm really sorry and I hope I'm not intruding." You blink lazilly, not all too thrilled with your Nurse's invasion of personal privacy. But she was just excited about her job, you completely understood that she was just being enthusiastic. "No, not at all..." you say sleepilly, only just now realizing that you hadn't woken up at all...

"WHAT ARE YOU DOING IN MY BEDROOM?!" you shout, throwing both the covers and Betsy off of you in your thrashing, "AND GET OFF OF ME!!" due to her small stature and (still) light weight, the poor braided girl was sent into the wall, sliding down and busting her small behind on the floor. "Ow!" she whimpered, "I was just putting everything down on your bed, I swear!!" she is quick to defend herself, a heavy shade of embarrassed red crawls up her cheeks as she rubs the back of her head. "Oh." you peep, still not quite used to an employee who wasn't raunchy, randy, or abusive, "My bad."

"It's alright, I think I understand why you're so jumpy in a crazy house like this." she says almost all-too-forgivingly. All you can do is let out a knowing laugh, "Yeah, I'm glad I'm not the only one who thinks all these women are crazy!" you say as you offer her a helping hand off of the ground. As you help her up, you can't help but notice just how light she is. Even after staying so long in this house of seemingly endless treats, Betsy Franklin's stick thin body hadn't gained an ounce! In fact, it almost seemed like she'd...

"Wow, you're looking great Betsy!" you can't help but be amazed that the diminiative and somewhat klutzy nurse had actually looked thinner than when she got here! "Have you lost some weight?"

Her face turned that embarassed shade of red again as she turned away from you, "Oh no, I-I don't think so... I-I guess it's just all the extra chores I've picked up around here, that's all!" betsy squeaked, glasses getting foggy at your compliments as she shrunk into her sweats. Your expression changes to one of humorously blank realization, "Oh yeah, that's right... Anya and Mika have really started to take advantage of her trusting nature..." you grimace to yourself, perturbed by the respective devious sides of your girlfriend and guard, "Well whatever you're doing, it's working."

"Th-Thanks." Betsy giggles as she adjusts her round glasses nervously, bending over to collect and straighten the pile of papers that you had kicked off of the bed earlier. "It's nothing, really though!" she squeaks meekly, finishing her stack and carrying them close to her near flat chest. "Hey, you wanna get some breakfast?" you ask her, "I'm about to head that way, why don't you come along?"

"Sure thing, just let me finish up with these..." she says professionally, bending over your bed to double-check her organizational skills, "I think the Guadalupe Contract got mixed up with the Hidalgo Plan..."

"Ahem." a foreign voice opted from the doorway; it was Anya! Just the woman you hadn't seen this morning first-thing(something that she was probably upset at)! "What, gotta give the new girl all my duties now; I thought that I was supposed to wake you up!" she huffs, crossing her arms and sashaying into your quarters, "A girl could get really jealous if she thought her boyfriend was making googly eyes with some new office jockey."

Actually, "office jockey" was far from Betsy's current position in the house. Since coming into the role of the house's nurse and evenly dividing Suzu's duties between her and her colleagues, the would-be doctor had also adopted several of Anya's chores and regular duties! At first it was nothing, a cleaned room here, a swept floor there; but Anya had started to take these acts of kindness for granted... and her laziness definately showed. Already, in just a short month, Anya had already added another twenty or so to her bloated body. Her belly sagged a bit further down her lap, brushing awkwardly against the tops of her white thighs as she walked now, and all of her outfits seemed to reveal a sneaky crescent moon of soft ivory flesh that victoriously peeked from the bottom of every top. Her ass, quite gigantic already, only seemed to accumulate more pudge as she continued to suffocate her poor cheeks with the couch cushions, Mimi's newest batch of cookies in one hand and the remote in the other...

"WHAT GOOGLY EYES?!" you shout as Anya's soft arm interlocks with yours, sticking a slender tounge out at Betsy playfully. "Oh I'm just bustin' your chops, come on, let's go get some breakfast; I'm itching for another one of those hot-fudge chocolate chip pancakes!" Anya says excitedly as her stomach joins yours in a duet of hunger. Your girlfriend holds you close as you escort her down the hall, keeping your arms lovingly interlocked as she continued to berade you playfully, keeping a watchful eye on the bespeckled "competition"...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Weight+: 0 and 20 or so...

choices: Mimi and a new, plump Veronica bring out breakfast!
What could be taking them so long?
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
"Hey thewre evwybody!" Mimi's most adorable smile decorated her round face, cheeks bouncing as she giggled excitedly at your appearance, "Bweakfast'll be ready in abowt ten minutes- twry not to stawve!"

"AGH!!" Anya groaned from her seat, "I'M NOT GONNA LAST TEN MINUTES!!"

"Something tells me you won't starve..." Kara quips from across the table (knowingly sitting beside Mika, lest any actual violence occur)

"You got something to say to my face?"

Meals around the house were getting back to their usual livelyhood. Even if they did often end with Anya threatening to rip out Kara's hair. Everyone had started to look forward to food again now that Mimi's food had done a complete 180 back to edible, especially you. Food seemed to be a common ground between your girls, when the food was bad they could all unite over how bad it was, but when it was good they could all gorge themselves happilly! Probably not healthy, but pleasant meals were nice.

Another installment that had been sorely missed was Kate's attendance at the dinner table. After a month of darkness and woe, her porcelain skin had gotten even paler than before; and she was scared out of her mind when she saw new people in the house (no one had bothered to warn her beforehand) But even after prying her from behind your back, Kate wasn't comfortable around anyone new. Not just yet. Still, it was Hot Fudge Covered Chocolate Chip Pancake day, one of Kate's favorite treats. You made this a regular breakfast item so that Kate would get out of her room once in a while, but everyone seemed to enjoy them.

Actually, Mika and Mimi hadn't changed much; much to your suprise over how much that those two had proven they could pack away. Maybe they were just too fat for you to notice, but Mimi's waddling little frame seemed didn't seem any bigger than last month. And as for Mika, you just stopped trying to measure her. At her weight, it was hard to notice something as little as a few extra pounds. But her belly did seem a little softer than usual, as you experienced during your last accidental embrace...

"Anyway, so what's with the coffee machine in my office?" Kara asks, taking a sip of some fresh espresso, "I mean, I'm not complaining or anything, but isn't it a little weird for someone in the medical field to drink so much caffine?" she asked, patting a steadilly growing potbelly that had been slowly inflating underneath her pair of swelling hooters. "We know, we know, it's not healthy." Anya grumbled, "You've said that a million times." Kara huffed, "Well it's not!" she said indignantly, "I mean, seriously, how did Suzu stay so thin with the constant temptation of this stuff?!"

You snorted, finding it ironic that Suzu in fact didn't stay thin. Kara was a very girly-girl, and you had come to welcome that fresh personality after the constant stifling of your manliness in this house of strange women. And you figured it out; Kara looked a lot like Suzu in her physical build. Tall, big breasted, and tan. But she was not Suzu. She was whiny and weak; if it weren't for her flirtatious behavior, you might have gone as far as they were complete opposites! But as she started to fill out slightly, Kara seemed like a visual substitute to an earlier Suzu which, in a way, seemed to irk at you...

"Oh cram it, you scrawny crybaby, drink your coffee." Anya barked, resting back on her softened palms.

Even the sweetie-pie Kate seemed to agree with her red-headed counterpart as she quietly downed another breakfast cake. She too must have felt uncomfortable with Kara's resemblence to Suzu. She cowered behind you every time Kara tried to converse with her, and her usually sweet-as-sugar expression turned pouty and indignant at the mere sight of the replacement doctor. You look over to your left, Kate's usual seat, and pat her on the chubby white palm comfortingly as the other stuffed a coffee cake into her mouth.

There seemed to be a lot of tension about these new doctors...

"Can't we all just get along?" you solemnly ask yourself...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: "Don't be an Instigator!!"

choices: At lunch, Betsy's appetite appears to have improved greatly. Hmm, how odd.
Veronica finally snaps but in an unexpected way.
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
"I'm just saying that this really isn't healthy. I mean, all this food simply isn't healthy! No wonder you're all so fat!" Kara continued, oblivious to the hypocrisy as she rubbed her growing paunch.

"And what I'M just saying," Anya began, angrily,"is that you are a stuck up little bi-"

Fortunately, before things could escalate any further, Veronica walked through the kitchen entrance pushing a trolley laden with pancakes. Like Pavlov's dogs, the women, with the exception of Betsy, in the room began salivating at the sight of the chocolate drenched breakfast food. Mimi followed the nurse, taking a seat next to Mika. Veronica slowly moved around the table, setting down plates stacked high with fudgey flapjacks. When the confections had been doled out, she sat down as well, taking a place next to Mimi.

There was a reason why a task that should have taken only a couple of minutes took closer to ten. Well, two. First, Veronica was lazy. Not lazy in the sense that she didn't do anything, but in the sense that she set her own pace and that pace was slow. Secondly, Veronica was fat. Or at least plump. It was astounding (or maybe not) how much damage Mimi could deal to a girl's figure in just a month. You would never have thought that a girl could gain forty pounds in a single month but the wobbling, slightly off balance proof was right in front of you.

Misjudging the space her body required, she plopped down too close to Mim, .squeezing her chubby thigh against one of Mimi's lowermost rolls. She scooted away soon after. Mimi retaliated by swatting Veronica's bubble butt, but the girl hardly seemed to notice.

That was another quirk of Veronica's. She seemed completely oblivious to innuendo or anything sexual. Apparently, she never noticed Mimi's sexual assaults but, instead of getting discouraged, the chef redoubled her efforts, going to ever greater lengths to provoke her lazy helper.

Looking down from your musings, you noticed a horrible sight: an empty plate. And it was yours.

The culprit was obvious: Anya's plate had nearly double the amount of pancakes that it started with. Each was soaked through and through with sweet, gooey maple syrup and your voracious beau was tearing her way through the stack with reckless abandoned.

"Anya! That was mine! I wanted breakfast too."

"Fhat, hom merh smmrf om moo gem mhat?" She swallowed. "What, don't you want me to get fat?"

You heard a spluttering sound coming from your left as Betsy sprayed the pancake she was chewing across the table into Kara's face. Apparently, she had not aware of the fact that Anya was intentionally fattening herself up, but you were too focused on getting something to eat to notice her reaction.

Of course, it was a lot scause and you ended up going without breakfast, having to make due with a glass of milk as your staff chewed through a remarkably large amount of foodstuffs. At least you could take solace in the fact that Anya had eaten double the already generous portions (though she probably would have gotten most of yours anyway).

Unable to focus on anything due to the gnawing hunger in your gut, your day speeds by, quickly arriving at lunch time.
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Feeding Time

choices: As Betsy stuffs herself sick, Anya gets suspicious of her new behavior...
Betsy's newfound appetite goes unnoticed; but you somehow manage to go hungry...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
"Lunchti~ime is the best ti~ime to eat lunch!!"

Mimi sang as she pranced down the hall, informing everyone within earshot that it was time for the customary early mid-day meal. Galloping down the hall at a slow, steady waddle, you could faintly make out the word "lunch" behind your heavy mahogany door. Suddenly and without warning, you burst from your study rejuvinated; your fatigue and despair completely erased as another chance to fill your belly rears it's head!

Mouth salivating at the idea of finally getting something to eat, you quickly outlap Mimi and hustle down the stairs. Within moments, you reach the second floor; lunch was just one hallway and one flight of stairs away! All but sprinting down the hall, you hear the old floorboards creak beneath your hasty pace, all the while getting closer and closer to the stairwell. Six doors, five doors, you were halfway there. Four doors, three doors down you could smell whatever ambrosia Mimi was cooking and the intense hunger pains were driving you insane! Two doors, only one more to go-

BAM.

Your face makes impact, causing you to fall to your knees clutching your nose. Hopefully, it wasn't too banged up. "JEEZUS!!" you howl, choking back tears as the pain spreads to the back of your neck and radiates throughout your rattled skull. "Oh my gosh!" a by now familiar explative around the houseas more and more accidents seemed to occur; leaving no doubt in your mind who it was who opened the door so suddenly and knocked you six ways from Sunday. Betsy Franklin, the household klutz. "O-Oh no, I- are you okay?!" she wailed, clammoring to your side apologetically as you continue to clutch your abused olphactory sensor in pain. "Oh my gosh, say something, I didn't hurt you too badly did I?!" she pries your hands away only to start pinching at your nasal bridge with her fingers, "Lemme look at it, please?!"

"Oh good, it's not broken" she pants, tilting your head back for further inspection, "It's not even bleeding... oh, you're not mad at me are you, sir?!" she begs. Of course you were mad, not so much at her as much as in general. But you could only shake it off, the pain radiating from your nose was nothing compared to the one gnawing at your stomach inside and out. "Yeah, yeah, dno big deal." you say hastilly, rising to your feet with a little assistance from your attacker. You raise your hand to gently stroke the tip of your nose, making sure for yourself. Sure enough, you were fine enough. But there was something on your hand, it wasn't any stray snot or blood that might have come flying out, it was...

"Is dis choklat?" you asked aloud, licking the sticky brown substance on your index finger; the teasing amount of food intensifying your hunger pains. Your watery gaze travels upwards to meet Betsy's but thanks to a lack of concentration on your part (and really blurry vision) you failed to notice the scrawny nerd's cheeks grow bright red behind her big round glasses. "Th-That's weird, how'd you m-manage to get chocolate on your nose?" she stuttered, wiping off the substance with a lens cloth from her pocket.

"I-I dob't dknow..." you stutter, just a little bit out of it after taking a door to the face. Rubbing your nose to clear up your ruptured sinuses, your slur finally clears up. "Ugh... let's just go get some lunch, I'm starving..." you mumble solemnly, turning around and checking your face for any trace of the chocolatey substance.

"Oh, uh, yeah!" she chirps eagerly, "Just hold on a second, I have to drop something off back in my room!"

What you didn't see was your eager young nurse pulling chocolate bar wrappers from her pockets, about seven of them, and hastilly tossing them into the wastebasket. She hustled over to the room's armoir and fixed her frazzled braids in a quick attempt at primping. Betsy would then grab a hankercheif from the dispenser to wipe off her hands and hastilly jog out the door, face blushing bright red.

"Hey, you alright in there?" you ask impatiently, unable to stop your momentum completely and quietly inching towards the staircase, lest feel any hunger longer than absolutely necessary.

"Coming!" she chirps eagerly, rushing to meet you (at this point already halfway down the stairs)
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: High Aspirations and an Abused Olphactory System

choices: Betsy throws herself at you and confesses that she's fallen for you!
Betsy's actually a distant relative who's wanted to get in touch with you?!
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
You looked down at your plate. It was nice, unchipped porcelain, white and clean. It had no design, but there was a certain beauty in it's purity. But it was wrong.

Where before had sat a beautifully made double decker ham and cheese sandwhich, complete with dijon mustard and garnish, there was nothing. You turned to Anya. Though she was busily masticating her own reuben, it was pretty obvious she hadn't taken yours.

You squirmed, uncomfortably tight, sitting between Betsy and Anya. For some reason, you had less and less room everyday. Well, technically Anya was continuing to grow, but not fast enough to explain this!

Glancing at Betsy, you noticed that her face might be just a titch rounder then you remember. You also notice her apparently inhaling the same thing you had. Before you could conclude that she had stolen your sandwich, you noticed that her own plate was bear. Obviously this was a coincidence and nothing more.

You spent the rest of lunch morosely staring at your barren plate, tortured by the sounds of happy mastication. You'd been steadily losing weight due to the lack of sustenance and were getting unhealthily thin. You resolved to make a snack after the meal had concluded.

************

Like a stealthy assassin, Betsy crept through the kitchen. Though Mimi spent most of her time within the room, she tended to leave after meals for some 'personal' time and Betsy used this to her advantage to sneak food. It had been a struggle, at first, and she had to force herself to eat. But over the course of two weeks she'd found it to come easier and easier. She was actually starting to enjoy the gorging, in fact.

Unfortunately, she wasn't alone. As she approached one of the many large refrigerators in the kitchen, she saw you making a snack. Betsy stopped, careful not to alert you to her presence. Her heart thumping in her chest, the interim nurse came to a decision. You were alone. Now was the perfect time to confess.
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Stolen Food and Stealthy Meeting

choices: You're not interested in her like that at all, and you let her know that!
Before you can break away, she runs away ashamed. Ask around about her?
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
You lightly spread your condiments on the piece of bread, salivating profusely at the delicious smell of your top-quality groceries. Grabbing some ham, cheese, and some lettuce and delicately stacking them on your bread, you throw some tender love and care into the mix by making sure everything is just right with your snack. Putting it on a small coffee plate, your hunger pains seem to increase phenominally... but soon that would all be over once you ate this delicious, mouth watering-

"Um, c-can I talk to you about something?" Betsy's normally loud (usually apologetic) voice seemed timid behind you, meek and quiet was definately something new from Betsy. Not to be rude intentionally, but all you really wanted to do right now is eat your sandwich before the Food Gods denied you yet another meal. Taking no chances and sparing formality, you shove a huge bite of the thick stacker in your mouth and start talking. "Jeah, s'hoot." you sputter.

Betsy takes a seat next to you, fiddling with her slightly thicker fingers nervously as she sat. "I-I, I... uh..." she stammers, much to your confusion and slight annoyance. Here you were, trying to eat a sandwich because someone kept running around stealing your food in your own (well, inheirited) house, and Betsy was getting in the way of-

"D-Do you like Anya because she's overweight?" the words poured out of her mouth like a waterfall, completely and totally our of her control as they sped off of her tounge and burned rubber into your ear. "I-I mean it's just, well I know its dumb but..." You can only help but smile as you relax slightly (but not dare put down that damn sandwich) "No, I don't just like her because she's overweight." you say contentedly, "I like her because, well, she's-

"S-So, her weight has nothing to do with... the fact that you..." Betsy says solemnly, eyes travelling downwards to focus on her twiddling digits, trying very hard not to say the dreaded 'L-word' to describe your relationship, "L-Like her?" Sadly, the nerdy girl eyes her growing paunch, hidden behind her loose attire but still very much there. "Well, she used to be a real fat-a-phobe if you want the truth, but eating really seems to make her happy now, so I'm all for it." you stammer, growing red in the face as Betsy gives you the third degree, "I mean, she's really cute with all that weight and everything but still I-HEY, WHY THE SUDDEN INTEREST?!" you break away from that conversation, not so much interested in her response as much as you are getting off the subject.

Immediately, the already crimson Betsy turns a deep purple at your question. Her increased twiddling speed goes unnoticed as does her foggy glasses. You didn't notice her sweating or how she seemed to be tugging at her oversized sweater with her interlocked hands. "W-W-Well I-I-I, uh, I-I-I, wh-what I m-m-mean to say is..." she stammers, barely able to form coherent sentences at this dangerous level of embarassment, "I-I-I th-thought you just liked her for her w-weight and, um, oh gosh..."

Ever the caring, comforting young employer that you are, you place a (meaning one you're still locked on that sandwich.) sympathetic hand on Betsy's shivering shoulder. "Hey, you can talk to me, you don't have to be afraid." you say soothingly, "We're all friends here." Unfortunately, Betsy's condition only grows worse as you make physical contact with her, and she immediately loses control and starts frenching you. However, it takes you a second to realize what was going on, your mouth half-expecting the only thing in there to beeither more ham, lettuce, or cheese...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Is that Tounge in my Mouth? Or More Sandwich?

choices: The library, buried in work and shoving cookies into her mouth in trios
Doubled back in the kitchens, eating her way through a mountain of ice cream
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
As her tongue probed the half full cavern of your mouth, several emotions vied for your attention. Confusion, arousal, shame, and sadness were all in competition. Despite the passion with which she launched her offensive, Betsy was the first to retreat, disengaging from the forced kiss.

Muttering a sad, quiet "I'm sorry..." she scampered out of the kitchen in full retreat, her eyes, unbeknown to you, glistening with tears.

Before you could do anything, even take a bite of your sandwich, let alone come to terms with your turbulent emotions, the fist of an angry God knocked you to the ground.

Or goddess, it would turn out, as a furious Anya proved that despite her new pudge she still had the stopping power of a championship boxer. You lay on the floor spitting out fragments of ham and lettuce.

"YOU MORON HOW COULD YOU DO THIS TO ME!?" She shouted, crimson with rage. "WHORING AROUND WITH OTHER WOMEN LIKE THIS! HOW LONG HAS THIS BEEN GOING ON!?"

Tears began pouring down her face as she said very softly "I thought you loved me..."

"Anya, you don't understand! She jumped me! I was just trying to make a sandwich! I DO love you! I'd never do anything like this to hurt you."

Leaping up you managed to grab Anya before she could bolt and held her tight, making calming noises as she sobbed on your shoulder.

Half an hour later, you'd managed to calm down your portly maid and explain exactly what happened.

"I still can't believe she'd try a stunt like that on MY man!" Huffed Anya, giving you a proprietary kiss. "I'm gonna fire her ass!"

Seeing your stony countenance, she recanted, changing "fire" to "ream".

Wanting to keep the matter private, the two of you began your search without informing any of the other members of the household of the events. Anya clung to your arm like a barnacle on a ship, afraid that if she separated from you for even a second you'd be jumped by some estrogen crazed maniac. Her close contact slowed you considerably, her belly pressed into your side and her hips threatening to knock you over with every swing. Still, it was rather pleasurable and infinitely better to the alternative of being Anyaless so you kept your mouth shut. After several hours of searching in the usual places and being unable to locate her, you were at wits end. But there were only a finite number of places to sulk and you located Betsy in...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: The Search for Betsy

choices: Leaving Anya to clean up, you take Betsy to the dining hall to sort all this out
You take Betsy outside to talk... boy you've got some nosy employees...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
The library.

"Really, this is probably the first place we shoulda looked." Anya huffed as she crossed her arms, "I mean, she likes reading and everything." All you could do was furrow your brow, Anya was probably right and you hated to admit it after a long night of running around and turning the house inside out looking for the elusive Betsy Franklin. "Yeah yeah, I'm a moron, lets just go." you grumble under your breath. Had it not been for Anya's simple suggestion, you may very well have never found Betsy's hiding spot...

And what a hiding spot it was...

Of course you had been to the library before, that was almost a given after staying so long in your mansion. But any reading you had to do was left to the vast shelves in your study, you had never actually borrowed anything from Uncle Lucas' extensive reserve of books before! There wasn't really much to it, other than the seating arrangements scattered about the room, a fireplace and a loveseat adjacent to it there weren't many places Betsy could be hiding. The second floor, really just an extension of the first with the floor knocked out to accomidate the taller bookshelves, was visible from the first of course. So if she wasn't on the first floor...

"She's up there?" you whisper to Anya quietly, lest you startle your meek admirer from her hiding spot. "I guess so..." she whispers back, moving some of her long red hair from her ear to better listen for any telltale whimpers, snorts, or any annoying "Oh my gosh"s, "I don't really hear anything..." Anya says quietly, "Maybe she's not?"

Suddenly a quiet crumbling sound catches your attention, something soft yet stable enough to leave crumbs had just been munched on from the upstairs portion of your library. Shortly after, the sound of rustling wrappers acts as condemning evidence, "Hey Anya, you hear that?" you whisper to your girlfriend, who shakes her head a resounding yes. "Yeah, y'think it's her?" she asks, round cheeks bouncing slightly. "It's gotta be, she'd be the only one in the house who uses this room." Anya huffs quietly, "Oh, what, so now I'm illiterate?" she teases, "So now all your servants; Mika, Mimi, Kate, we're all stupid little fat girls who can't read?" she gets in closer, grabbing you around the middle and forcing you into her belly playfully, "KNOCK IT OFF!!" you rasp, "THIS ISN'T GOING TO HELP!!" Anya releases you begrudgingly, "What, you're my boyfriend, I'll screw around with you whenever I want." she sticks her tounge out at you, "Not my fault Foureyes up there is sensitive."

"Anya are you... jealous?"

"EXCEEDINGLY!!" she noogies you angrilly, "SOME LITTLE GIRL WANTS TO MAKE KISSYFACE WITH MY MAN AND I'M SUPPOSSED TO BE FINE WITH IT??!"

"SHHH!!" you try to quell her mighty temper after hearing some footsteps upstairs followed by a resounding, "You guys aren't very good at sneaking up on people..." It was Betsy; and she heard you. And what a position for her to catch you two in, what with her feelings and all. "Betsy come down so we can talk about this!!" you call to her, your voice echoing throughout the spacious library. You would hope that Betsy would be forgiving enough to stomach your presence, especially with Anya behind you, but no such luck.

"J-Just go away, please..." she squeaked over the railing, the visible portion of her face quite red when compared to her brunette bangs. You sigh, genuinely sorry that any of this had to happen. "Look, why don't I just come up there with you then?"

Both Betsy and Anya looked at you with matching levels of confusion, "Yeah, I mean, we can talk this out; we're still friends right?" The plumping nurse above you cowered, "I-I don't know... I like you, and you... you like Anya... I-I just don't know, just leave me alone!!" she wails, returning to whatever she was doing before you and Anya came along. You catch the sound of rustling wrappers again, followed by scurrying footsteps. Quickly catching sight of the stairwell, you madly dash over to it in an attempt to intercept her escape route.

Unfotunately, it worked.

Betsy had closed her eyes in her desperation, and you reached your position just as her hurried pace managed to catch the fifth step from the ground and heading for the fourth. You were on the fourth headed for the fifth. As you collided, Betsy's things were strewn all about the library, papers, file folders... cookies. One such popped the head maid on the scarlett head, catching her attention. "Cookies... comfort food?" she asked aloud, not really expecting anyone to really answer her, and those papers... "Is that the Huitheurcinq contract? Master Lucas lost a lot of money when that document went missing!"

"I was... oh my goodness..." Betse struggled to regain coherence on the stairs, her plush behind balanced precariously on the angle of one stair, "I was just trying to get something done... so, y'know... he wouldn't... fire me..." she squeaked, now noticing that you, dazed from your impact, had fallen onto her not-so-nonexistant-anymore breasts. "O-O-OH MY GOSH!!!" she hollered, jumping back to let your face come into contact with the stair. "Ow." you say plainly, having long grown accustomed to pain in this household...

"Betsy, I think we need to talk."
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Where for art thou Betsy Franklin?

choices: "Let us?"
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
Deciding against her better judgement, Betsy readilly agreed to talk this predicament out. Maybe it was a drive to put an end to this mess, but something more seemed to twinkle in those puffy red eyes. Something not quite malicious, or even so much as malcontent. Just something that reassured you that there was much more to be said than had already. You bade Anya farewell and escorted the weeping temp out the library door, leaving your girlfriend to pick up the debris that your collision with Betsy had left in its wake. Of course all that bending over was a challenge for her and those already tight-but-fresh-from-the-store pants of hers, so she helped herself to a few of those cookies Betsy had been stuffing down her kraut. But while momentarily satisfied in regards with appetites, Anya had a sneaky suspicion that Little Miss Freckleface hadn't quite gotten her fill of you.

"Something's up." she said quietly after the door slammed shut...

***


The Courtyard was a perfect choice for dealing with personal matters of great weight. It was calm and spacious, and at night even gave off a certain romantic aura that permeaded many a date you had shared with Anya over the course of your relationship. Tonight, though, was a different story. One very similar to a night that still lingered around in the back of your mind, the one where Suzu had confessed herself to Kate and was scorned into nearly quitting her job.

Looking back on it all, that night and the series of events that followed inadvertantly had led you back here, to the very courtyard where Suzu's exodus began. This place held a very mysterious connotation in your mind, at one point beautiful and quiet and at another that silence was simply a hush- one that follows a gunshot or a climactic scene in a movie. That uneasy silence had built up tension in the back of your throat, the air feeling warm and heavy as you escorted your admirer around the grassy knoll.

"It's nice." she said in a hushed voice, the first words she'd said to you since your walk started. Looking down at her, you could only see the top of her haid, twin braided tails of her brown hair bouncing up and down slightly with every step. Her glasses reflected the hanging moon and it's light in their topmost corners, leaving her sad brown eyes open for your interpretation. Were they upset at you for refusing her advances? Or were they forlorn at the fact that a relationship between the two of you right now was nearly impossible? "Yeah..." you must be getting melancholy, usually your responses were better than 'yeah'.

"You must be getting melancholy." she said, not exactly her perky self tonight either, "Usually your responses are a lot better than that."

You can't help but crack a smile, she obviously knew you better than you had given her credit for, "Yeah." you say again, this time with a much softer shade to your upset color. Betsy stopped dead in her tracks, keeping her head ducked down low so that you couldn't see her eyes, "Can we stop?" she raised her voice ever so slightly to accentuate her frustration, "We've been walking in circles all around this stupid courtyard for a half an hour now." Your muscles tense, then relax. She was right, you hadn't done much talking. "Yeah, sure." you keep your voice low so as to not raise any feelings of anger, "Where do you wanna go?"

Giving your proposal some thought, Betsy's head tilts back upwards- giving you a clear view of her mournful brown eyes behind her glasses, "Over there." she says, pointing deep into the courtyard, "In the middle, let's sit there."

You were a bit perplexed at her odd suggestion, as there was no table nor bench to sit at in the entire courtyard; and the middle was no exception. "Why there?" you can't help but ask, it was a really weird choice after all. But you got no response other than a glare with ambiguous intent. But her flexed eyebrows and quivering lower lip led you not to protest and you go along with it. She walks up to you, newly budded bosom bouncing somewhat underneath her sweater, and grabs you by the hand firmly. She takes the lead from here, taking very precise measurements in her steps as she led you down into your own courtyard.

"4...5...6...7..." she counted off with every deliberate step she took, not looking down past her developing curves to check if her footing was off or not. What was she doing? Counting down to something like a time limit? You could only wonder and follow blindly, she wasn't counting your steps, only hers. "12...13...14...15..." she continued counting down as you trailed behind her obediently. Betsy had always been a bit of a perfectionist, did this have something to do with-

"Stop here." her pace stops for the second time, your lag leading you to her halted point. "Why here?" again, you can't help but ask. You could understand that she was upset, that was a given. But why was she acting so mysterious? Behind those glasses, you could almost swear up and down that she had planned this whole walk. But no, that didn't sound like the Betsy Franklin you knew. Instead of giving you a legitimate response, her body lay itself down on the knoll and gaze up at you, beckoning you to come down and join her. You couldn't help but take up her offer, it seemed harmless enough.

And as you lay your head down on top of countless blades of grass, you understood why: the view was magnificent.

The deep blue contours of the sky were freckled with a sea of endless stars. The pitch-black background crowned with the lusciously round moon who, like a beautiful woman in a crowd, claimed all the attention for itself. It was a human response to look up at the moon when gazing at the sky, and it seemed that the moonenite response was for it to stare back at it's admirers. You knew that. But tonight it felt as if you had claimed all of it's attention, like it had shunned the rest of it's adoring fans for you. "We're in the exact center of the courtyard, you know." Betsy's voice said quietly beside you, "That's why I waited so long to let you and Anya find me..."
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: the Melancholy of a Master and his Nurse

choices: The next morning, Betsy and Anya have some unfinished business to attend to...
Time passes by, Suzu is due home any day now... What of our temporary Nurses?
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
"Let us?" you parrot, too enthralled by your vision to really be upset. You couldn't tear your eyes away from the beautiful sky that Betsy had showed you. She hadn't looked over either, wrapped up in her own spell of the moon. "You mean you were hiding until then?" Betsy gave a small noise to confirm you accusation, "I was hiding in the kitchen first, but then I heard Anya looking for me and sneaking a little bit of dinner." you let out a small, unperturbed "Huh." and she kept going, "Then I was in the bathroom on the third floor next to your office, but you had to pee." again a slight rumble of confirmation that you were listening to her soothing tone escapes your throat as she continues, "And then I guess I just wandered the halls for a while, I told Kara what happened."

You break away from your hypnotic stare at the beautiful sky to glance over to your left, where Betsy's face looked over to yours. "She told me what I should do; she said that I should take you somewhere special at midnight and show you how I felt." she lowered her eyelids considerably, seeming to stare at you with the same admiration she held for the lunar display she had brought you to. "So... you took me here?" you state calmly. "This is... probably one of the most beautiful places I've ever been." she said sweetly, glancing back up at the moon one last time, "At midnight, when all the lights shut off, and I'm in the exact center of the courtyard, I can see everything I want right here."

She turned back to you.

Betsy hesitated, rolling over slightly to caress your chin with her slender hands as she brought herself closer and closer to you. And eventually... you collided.

Her lips were soft in a way reminiscent of silk. Slowly, gently, they pressed together in a slight pucker as she offered their warm embrace to your own. Moistness filled your breathing space as she began breathing harder, her innocent pucker giving way to an adventurous probing tongue that forced its way through her lips and into your mouth. She moved it fluidly, the meshing of saliva and muscle coming naturally as she grabbed your hand. The chubby girl used it as a push-off point to roll the rest of her over just a little bit closer to you, allowing you to feel just how soft her misguided attempts at satisfying your fetishes had made her.

Beneath her gray sweater, you could feel the soft paunch that her binges had granted her, the back of your clenched hand was forced into her doughy expanse so deeply that every movement of your fingers was blocked by a soft apron of enveloping fat. Her right bosom was squished against the ground and your chest, but the left one let free to muscle about unobstructed (she had taken care to remove her bra before your walk in an earlier stop to "get the tear stains off of her glasses")

Her lips released yours.

"Do you feel the same way?"

"Wh-what?"

"I can see everything that I want right here." she whispers, bringing herself back to the comfort of your mere presence. You understood now. She wanted you. In more of a way than a crush or a simple case of admiration taken too far. Betsy Franklin had deemed you worthy enough to... make this night very special.

Unfortunately, while passionate as a red-blooded male could be towards a member of the preferred sex, you were spoken for. Anya was your love, a rapidly growing part of your life. You had known Betsy for the shy side of a few months, but Anya had been cuddling up to you since you first inheirited this mansion! "B-Betsy, I-

"Oh no... I screwed it up, didn't I?" she said, choking back tears once again, "I-I didn't mean... I just...I j-j-just..." but her sentence was cut short as she let out a loud howl of bawling, sitting up on her knees and covering her dampening face with her hands. "w-ww-wanted you to..." she tried to continue, only for her sobs to choke her words back into her mouth. The only thing you could do now was sit up, wrap her up in your arms, and comfort her...

***


At first, it was only Mika and Anya who decided to eavesdrop, as it was Anya's boyfriend and Mika's equipment put up to ante here. But sure enough Kara had the same idea that Anya did, having given Betsy the bright idea to try and seduce you in the first place, and Mika decided to kill two birds with one stone. Unfortunately, she had blabbed to Veronica who, through a mouthful of pie (not just ones with whipped cream) in turn told Mimi. And once that happened, she just had to tell Kate that "Mastwr's havin' an orgy in the courtyawd! Let's go watch Katie!!"

This led to the entire supporting cast (Anya aside, as a main character) being squeezed into Mika's guard shack which admittedly was already "cozy" with just Mika inside.

"I DON'T BELIEVE... THAT... THAT... SKANK!!" Anya hollered into the listening ear of Mika's one-way observatory microphone. Had Mika's shoddy soundproofing of her shack not worked, you may have been alerted to her, along with the rest of the staff's, location as they eavesdropped in on your private moment with Betsy. "SHE THINKS SHE CAN JUST... JUST... GAH!!!" she hollered, punching one of the supporting beams that held up Mika's guard post.

"Calm down Anya, you heard him, he's not gonna do anything." Kara said, though her tone did little to help Anya's misplaced anger. It was actually one of mixed regret and disappointment; almost like she wanted you to do the nasty with her friend in the courtyard with your big fat girlfriend listening in. "Looks like I owe you ten bucks, Veronica." and, as such, she pulled out a crumpled $10 American from her inflating bosom and handed it to her stoic friend, who was indifferent.

"I wanned to hear teh smex!!" Mimi whined, hitting the console with her tiny fists of upstaged fury. Mika squirmed, though her blubbery booty didn't move an inch as her skeletal system squirmed so deep into her flab, "Hey, knock it off pipsqueak!!" she shouted, "You'll break it!" Next to Mika, squished between Anya and the wall, Kate let out a muted sigh; obviously relieved that you had opted out of the nasty.

"I SWEAR, THE NEXT TIME I SEE THAT LITTLE TRAMP, I'M GOING TO- TO... GRAHH!!" she let loose one flabby fist, punching the heavy metal console. "Owowowow!!" she waved her weakened hand about, sending her upper arms quite ajiggle."

"ANYA!!" Mika shouted, observing the machine with great care, "You better be careful with this thing!"

Suddenly a disturbance comes from your wallet, one that sounded vaguely similar to muffled shouting. Betsy was the first to notice it, reaching into your wallet (having fallen out in the struggle) and spying the tiny blue-tooth microphone that someone had "conveniently" placed. "Wh-What is..." she murmured as the tiny device started hooting and hollering with mixed voices.

"A-Anya?!" you holler

"SHH!! EVERYBODY SHUT UP!!" the microphone rasped
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: "How I Feel"

choices: Anya manages to calm Betsy down and the next two months pass uneventfully
Unfortunately, Betsy refuses to see reason and remains sad
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
It had been a long night but not in the pleasurable sense. After Anya had alerted you and Betsy to the bug in your wallet, she had dashed (well, waddled) off, a sobbing red-faced wreck and you had retired to your quarters, too mentally fatigued to do anything else but rest. Even so, you had spent the night tossing and turning, knowing that you would have to deal with Betsy (and Anya) in the morning.

And, lo and behold, your prophecy came to fruition. Only minutes after having grabbed a cup of coffee from the kitchen and only seconds after having installed yourself in the dining room, your girlfriend and her potential rival burst into the room. Confrontation loomed and you had neither the wits nor energy to meet it.

The pair of chubby- no, be honest- fat women elbowed their way through the double doors, almost becoming stuck in the process. They proceeded, double chinned neck in double chinned neck, towards you, Anya glowering and Betsy looking scared but determined.

Having arrived at your table, Anya placed her hands down and leaned forward, revealing a good deal of cleavage from her too tight bed clothes and resting her belly on the table.

"Well? You gonna tell her or what?" Anya began.

"Tell her what, exactly?"

"I dunno, that she's fired, that we're dating, that she can't have you, I'm not the boss here! JUST TELL HER SOMETHING!"

You shifted your gaze to Betsy, noticing that the mere mention of being fired had nearly sent her into a panic. You let out a heavy sigh; it was way too freaking early to deal with this.

"Look, Betsy, I'm not going to fire you. But, Anya's right, I do have something to tell you. I love Anya. You're a wonderful person, and I'm certain there's some lucky guy out there just waiting for you, but I'm already in a relationship. I'm sorry but we can never be together.

With that pronouncement made, the already weak zephyr powering the freckled girl's sails died. She visibly wilted, her chubby body sagging as the words hit home. Sniffling a little, she nodded.

"*sniff* I-I guess you're... right. I suppose I should have, *sniff*, known better... Now if you'll ex-ex-excuse me there's some paperwork I need to finiiiiiish!"

The last syllable came out as a heartrending bawl, your temp nurse running off to cry her eyes out. You rose to help her but Anya shook her head.

"I know it seems cruel, but ya can't go after her. She might take it the wrong way and, besides, this sorta thing needs a woman's touch. But not Mimi's... or Mika's. And definitely not that skank. And Kate doesn't talk. I don't think Veronica would agree to it..."

You cocked your head, looking at your red-headed maid expectantly. She noticed your expression and colored.

"Look, I know what you're thinkin', but I'm NOT going to console her. After what she tried to do to you, it makes me so ANGRY." Her anger overwhelming, your pudgy girlfriend punched the wall before yelping in pain. "She tried to STEAL you from me! Nobody steals from me! don't know if I can even control myself talkin' to her, regardless of how nice she may or may not be. I might knock her block off or somethin' else I'll regret."

You stand up, grab Anya's hand, and give it a squeeze.

"Come on, we can't just leave her like that. She's in pain. Even if you don't care, we've still got two months before Suzu comes back and I don't know how the house would deal with her. Do it, please. For me? I'll get you some of those cookies you like, the one's imported from France..."

"Mmm... I guess... but only if they're authentic. And it's a full, no wait, TWO full baker's dozens. I'll do it, but I can't promise I'll be happy doing."

"That's my girl! I love you so much!"

You reached over the table to squeeze your chunky girlfriend, spilling your coffee into your lap in the process.

" AUUUGH! HOT!"
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: The Morning After

choices: ...Go on...
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
"Go on, you can do it." you egg your girlfriend on, trying to ease her into opening the door that Betsy had locked herself behind. You and Anya had located the elusive Betsy Franklin by assuming that she would be in Suzu's office and, following the trail of cookie crumbs and tear stains in your carpet, you were right. To cement your assumptions, weak sobbing could be heard from behind the heavy office door. Anya stood there dourly contemplating the results of a pow-wow with Betsy, from the agitated look on her face, not many of the results ended well. If any. "What are you, scared?" your attempts at mood-lightening humor don't go over so well, but they catch her attention. She looks over at you from the corner of her eye, "What'd you just say?" she asks in a gruff tone, "Why would I be scared of that chubby, freckle-faced, four eyes when she knows damn well that I could clean her clock any day of the week?!"

Suzu's PA system clicked on, a rarity nowadays that had gone sorely missed. However it wasn't the breathy voice of your doctor sobbing into the microphone, as expected it had been Betsy Franklin. "Y-You know I can still hear you right?!" she bawled, safely hiding from behind the announcement system. Then the mouth clicked and her cries were again muffled by the door. You were both at a loss for words at her sudden outburst. On top of everything, now she had been insulted. Fan-freakin'-tastic.

In a stunning move of maturity and compassion, Anya slowly stepped forward and knocked on the door. "Hey, it's Anya." she said calmly, "Can I come in?"

You were taken aback by this new development, in that Anya had actually taken a step forward and reached out to Betsy who -as of maybe five minutes ago- was about to "have her face pounded inside out". The woman you had come to know as brash, arrogant, somewhat uncaring and egotistical in some cases, had actually shown some insight into her rival's feelings. You had honestly expected a vastly different set of outcomes, mostly involving you struggling to keep the two heavyweights from ripping each other's eyes out. In fact, a lot of options came to the table, but nothing quite like this...

Even more shocking still, the door cracked open just a hare. You could see Betsy's red puffy eyes from behind her glared coke bottle glasses. Her chubby fingers held the door open as she warily looked up to see Anya's cherubic, though most likely scowling, countenance. "Wh-What do you want?" she squeaked, obviously the human language was a bit of a stretch for her right now. "I wanna talk about this." Your redheaded belle said flatly, "This little problem isn't just going to fly out the window is it?" You could only stand in the hall and watch as the scene unfolded before you. Betsy's eyes quivered visibly before turning to you for comfort. "Is... uh..." she pointed at you weakly, only for Anya to cut her off with that sharp tongue of hers. "Nope, this is just gonna be you and me." she barked at the quivering girl, "Dumbass is gonna stay out here while we sit down and have a little girl talk."

Betsy's big brown eyes turn back to you in seeming desperation. The look on her face screamed "Please don't leave me alone with her." But she was right, you couldn't do much but make matters worse- this was Anya's job now. "Don't be too tough on her, alright?" you touch Anya gingerly on the shoulder, only for your affections to be coldly shrugged off with a movement of said shoulder. "Don't get all melodramatic on me now, Dork." she said confidently, "I'm only going in there to finish up what you weren't enough of a man to do yesterday. Don't think you're earning points with me for being the 'adult'." She turned and stuck her tongue out at you playfully, "You go and do whatever, don't eat lunch though." she smiled, "I wanna make up for this lost time, as long as I'm in here- that's how long I get to do whatever I want this evening."

"How's that any different than normal?" you quip slyly before a quick kiss...
***

"Huh, you've certainly added your own... personal touch." Anya remarked with little pleasure as she heaved her heavyset bod into Suzu's somewhat cramped office space; seeming even more cramped now that all this crap was in here. Or maybe because she was a lot bigger since she'd last entered? Either way, the intrusion of three different nurses had certainly impacted the once blasé decorum that was instituted when Suzu held the position. The brown paneling, still brown of course, was mostly buried under a mountain of paperwork that had yet to be filed. Judging by some of the dates on the lower piles, neither of the three temps could figure out Suzu's impossible filing system either. The desk was littered with knick-nacks, which save for her photo with Uncle Lucas and Kate Suzu abhorred, each of distinct style that clashed horribly with the other. Veronica's on the left, close to the wall and rather cutesy-gothic, Betsy in the middle, mostly tasteful, and Kara's on the end, mostly just her well worn coffee mug and a few discarded makeups. There was even a poster for crying out loud! One of a cat! Suzu's probably rolling in...well, whatever relaxed position she was in right now!

The startling change of scenery wasn't enough to really get Anya off track though, she was a woman with a mission; that being to put an end to this confounded love triangle. Betsy shut the door behind Anya's blubbery butt as she ushered her eternal rival into the office. "Yeah, Veronica and Kara are really big on decoration..." she said weakly, obviously making a pained attempt at avoiding this extremely tentative subject, "If only they actually matched things wouldn't look so... well, you know how they look." she chuckled weakly. Anya immediately sat down on a soft bench next to the doorway, her enormous rear forcing all air from the plush cushion. "Siddown, I didn't come in here to bitch you out for your lack of design skills." On command, Betsy retreated to her seat behind the desk.

"I-I know..." she squeaked
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.title: Girl Talk

choices: Anyway, so the next two months pass uneventfully as everyone learns to coexist
1112111221112221112211222111211111211112.content:
"You can't have him, ya know." Anya said matter of factly, "He's mine, and I love him. He loves me." she folded her chubby hands together and held them over her mouth, leaning forward as much as her billowing stomach would allow. "And I really don't appreciate you coming onto my boyfriend." she continued, "If you were anyone else, I'd knock the stuffing out of you." Betsy's eyes widened slightly at that, she lowered her head somewhat- seemingly contemplating how much stuffing there was to be knocked out. "In fact, I almost did, but he asked me not to." Anya said, still locked on target, "You're very lucky he asked me not to, or I'd probably al-"

Shockingly, Betsy mustered up the courage to do more than just meekly confirm Anya's statements; enough to actually cut the battleaxe maid off mid-sentence! "A-Actually, you're the lucky one..." she said sweetly, "I-I mean, you've got someone to hold you and care for you, while I've got... well, I've got nothing like that." she turned away, the tears coming back to her. "He's a great listener, and he's really sweet." she lamented, "I guess I just... wanted that for myself... I've never had a guy treat me like that before... I'm not very attractive."

And with that utterance of self-loathing, Anya completely understood everything. This girl had low self-esteem and took your simple gestures of kindness as inklings of romantic intent. The cold demeanor melted as Anya slowly started warming up to this plight. "Why do you say that, Betsy?" she inquired, "I don't think your ugly, my Idiot Boyfriend doesn't, I don't think I've ever heard anyone say anything like that at all... except for maybe me... and-" She cut herself off when she realized just where the problem stemmed from. "Kara." Betsy said quietly, "I-I know she's just teasing but... we've known each other since grade school...she's always been so popular... and she's always been saying things like that."

"I hate to break it to you, Betsy, but your friend is a totally wanked out bitch." Anya said forwardly, "She's got no idea what really matters, and you shouldn't listen to her when... well you probably just shouldn't listen to anything she says."

"Then how come no other guy except Him has ever been so nice to me, ever?!" Betsy barked back suddenly full of energy, "How come... how come I got stood up and my prom?!" she continued, now struggling to heave her heavier body from the chair, "I just thought... that if I gained a little weight, he would find me more attractive and- and... it didn't wooooork!" the last words came out as an elongated bawl as she fell to her knees. "And now that I'm fat, I'm even uglier than ever!" Anya couldn't help but fall down to the floor with her, plopping her heavy body down beside her with a loud thump. "Listen Bets." she said, remarkably sounding very much like an older sibling at this point, "Being fat doesn't make you unattractive, some people like it and some don't." she stated simply, "The inside is what matters, if eating makes you happy then you should keep doing it- no matter what anybody says." Betsy's waterworks increased heavily as she drew Anya into a hug. She struggled to wrap her arms around the thick maid but managed to get by, Anya patting her on the back the whole time.

"I'm sorry Anya!" she bawled, "I'm so so sorry!"

"Shh... there there..."
***

The door is a little cold. You can't help but notice that as your ear gradually grows sore from groping its hard wood. Judging by the heavy sobbing coming from behind that heavy oak door of yours, Betsy was really letting loose. Those weren't Anya's cries, they were too high pitched and there wasn't anything broken beforehand. And since you couldn't make out much more than muffles, your imagination was left to itself. 121.content:
It was just another day in the big city. I got off from work late in the afternoon and caught a bus back home. Through the window I watched the streets become filthier with litter and the buildings older and shabbier as the bus drove me to where I lived.

I jumped off at the first stop and walked to the rundown building where I had stayed in for the past four years. I climbed the stairs and walked the hallway that had a musky smell to it and arrived at my door. Like the rest of my life, my apartment wasn't much but it was livable.

Sparsely furnished, for I scarcely had enough money to feed myself, with paint peeling off the walls, it provided me warmth and a roof overhead. I sighed, I kicked off my shoes and plopped myself down on the nearest sofa.

I didn't have much to eat during the day, and my stomach was roaring for some food. I couldn't wait to eat some spaghetti drenched in ketchup and watch an old movie on my laptop. But, as I scraped enough energy together to do just that, my phone in my pocket rang. I picked it up and answered.

"Hello? Will Turner here. Who is this?" I said.

"Good evening, Mr. Turner," said my caller, "My name is Mr. Witherberry. I'm a lawyer and I'm calling you to discuss a few details with you."

My body went rigid and I sat up, feeling my heart beginning to race in my chest. A lawyer was calling me. I didn't know much about the law, but I knew that such people meant that I'm being sued for something. Wow, wasn't this just wonderful! I had a job, a home and a big future ahead of me. I couldn't afford to get in trouble with the law.

"W-What did I do?" I heard myself asking.

"O, no, no, no," Witherberry said, "Your not in trouble. I'm calling you to discuss the details about a will that your uncle has left for you."

I calmed down. "What will?" I asked curiously.

"You see, your uncle has passed away recently and has left for you his estate, business, and fortune to you," the lawyer explained, "I'm calling to announce this to you and get you settled."

I frowned. What was this guy talking about? I remembered that I had one wealthy uncle somewhere in my family, but I knew very little about him, and the chances were good that he knew little about me. Why would he leave anything for me?

I shook my head. No, this was probably just some prank call. People didn't simply get rich overnight. That only happened in movies. I wasn't going to fall for this bullshit.

"Listen here, bucko," I replied sharply, "I don't know what game this is, but I ain't falling for it!"

"But, sir, I assure you this is not a jo-"

I cut the call and went on with my afternoon normally, forgetting the call. The persistent bugger tried calling me a few times, but I ignored my phone. But little did I know what big changes awaited me.

Payday. I could smell it. I was on my way to the nearest ATM to draw a few bucks to pay my rent and buy some food. While I tabbed in my password to my account, the conversation I had with the supposed "lawyer" still buzzed around in my head.

Really, it was silly. A wealthy uncle that I barely knew leaving me his business, fortune and estate. What a bunch of...

I looked back and saw a line of impatient people had gathered behind me. "S-sorry," I quickly apologized.

I drew 300 dollars and quickly left. Most people who found out that they had so much money would probably go on a shopping spree. Well, not me. The shock was so overwhelming that I slipped into a trance, my body acting on instincts while my brain tried to process what just happened.

When I finally slipped out of my trance I was sitting on a bench outside the mall. Three shopping bags filled with food that I could never afford with my previous salary sat next to me. My head was in my hands.

The shock was wearing off, and I could think things a little easier. I was a millionaire, owner of a estate, and probably a big shot CEO of some large company. Well, I couldn't just sit here all day. I needed to get home, call Witherberry and apologize for being such a oblivious ass.

I was on my way to catch a bus when I stopped. Across the street was a used car lot. With millions of dollars in my account I guess I can finally afford my own transport now. I had a driver's license since I was eighteen, and with a swipe of a card a bought a red car and was driving back home.

12111.content:
I froze. The door that led to my apartment was wide open. I always locked it and knew that this was a bad sign, for the area that I lived in had a infamous reputation for burglaries. My apartment, I saw, was gloomy when I snuck in and silent as a grave.

I groped around in the darkness and found I broom, hoping that it would defend me against any robber. As I moved into the living room, I jumped when the light switch suddenly turned on and someone spoke with a thick southern drawl.

"Well, well, about time someone showed up. I was beginning to think that'll ha'to stay here all night."

I turned. What I saw made me drop my broom, for I knew that it would be defenseless against a foe like this. She was taller than me by a few inches. She was obese, easily weighing over 300 pounds, but as sturdy as a brick wall. Her hair was blond, tied in a ponytail, her eyes a bright blue.

She was noisily chewing on a piece of bubblegum, watching me with a grin. Around her ample waist was a utility belt, and I saw that a holster contained a firearm.

She stepped forward. "You Will Turner?" she asked.

To be honest, I was intimidated by her size and afraid to answer. "Y-y-yes," I stuttered, taking a step back.

Her grin grew wide. "Ah, I finally found ya!" she exclaimed, grabbing me and pulling me into a crushing hug.

After she was done squeezing the life out of me, she set me down and introduced herself. "My name's Mika," she said, "I'm your bodyguard."

"My b-bodyguard?" I asked, astonished.

"Yup," Mika said with enthusiasm, before turning sad, "I was assigned to protect your uncle, but old stuff is gone now, but he told me before he went that I've got to go look after his little cousin, which would be you."

"How did you get in here?" I suddenly asked, remembering my open door.

"O, I picked the lock," she answered simply.

"You broke in!?" I exclaimed.

"Yeah," Mika said with pride, like breaking and entering was a good thing, "Have several useful skills to help ya."

I shook my head, changing the subject. "Why are you here?" I asked, "I didn't order for a bodyguard."

"Ya don't need to order for me," she said, "I'm around you 24/7. Anyway, I came to get ya out of this here dump and take you to the estate."

I nodded. Sooner or later I had to go to my house I inherited and move. "Just wait a few minutes," I said, "I need make a call first and pack a few th-"

Mika cut me off by grabbing my upper arm and saying, "I have to take ya now! The gals are all waiting for you back home, and boy, are they all worked up to see the new boss!"

The next thing I knew I was being dragged out of my apartment, being forced down the stairs and out of the building.

"Wait!" I cried, "My stuff!"

I tried to break free, but her grip was as strong as iron.

"We'll have it packed up and delivered for ya, don't you worry," she said while dragging me.

"And my car?" I asked.

"Be towed and added to the bunch of other cars ya already own" Mika said with a wink of her eye.

Outside a silver colored limousine awaited me, and Mika showed me into the back seat before climbing in herself.

"I got 'em," Mika said to a slender man in a neat suit, who I guessed was my chauffeur. "Get movin'. I don't like this place.

"Sure thing, miss," he said with a surprisingly deep baritone voice.

While the car drove off, Mika offered me some expensive wine to celebrate my succession, but I politely refused it. Instead, I looked out the window, watching as we drove further and further away, leaving the city and driving into the countryside.

From that moment on I knew that my old life was over and a new one gas began.

It was a rainy, cold winter afternoon on a Saturday. You were alone in your room eating a microwaveble lunch. Unfortunately, the power went out halfway through the process, so you were stuck with a foul near-inedible meal. You gag on the revolting pile of sludge that could be barely described as food. You go downstairs to look for something that won't make you cough up your stomach.

You open the fridge to find romaine lettuce, half a gallon of expired skim milk, and some smelly American cheese. You open the pantry to find some stale chips, cream of carpet soup (what?), and a tiny can of cashews. You sigh in despair as you hear your belly growl. You're quite a skinny lad, weighing in at 140 pounds standing 5'8" and this is the reaon why: you can't remember the last satisfying meal you've had.

"Uhg, I'm starving!" You exclaim, getting ready to throw a tantrum in vain. But then,

*ding dong*

You cock your eyebrow as you approach your door. When you open the door, you look left and right, seeing nobody.

"Stupid kids..." You say as you're about to close the door. But before you did, you heard a girl cleaning her throat. You looked down to see a very short and chubby girl. "Can I help you?" You ask the short plumper.

"The hell you can! It's fucking freezing out here!" She said. She shoved you out of the way and barged into your humble abode.

"What the hell do you think you're doing?"

"Is your name *insert name here*?"

"Yeah. What's it to you?"

"Do you know that your uncle Lucas bit the dust last month?"

You really started to get angry and confused. How did this shorty know about your late uncle? "What the hell do you want from me?"

The girl went to your kitchen and browsed your foodstuffs. "Wow. You live like a damn peasant, you poor bastard!" She said, laughing a little.

"Listen, if you don't explain yourself, I'm calling the cops right now!" You reached for the phone.

"You inherited your uncle's mansion."

You paused, flabbergasted. "I who-in-the-what-now?"

"Listen, if you come with me, I'll bring you to your new home and serve you the best lunch your scrawny tummy has ever had the pleasure containing," she said, poking your belly. "Or you can stay here and vomit up that block of cheese."

"What about lunch?"

The girl smiled.

"What's your name? And what business do you have with the mansion?"

"I'm Mimi, I'm your new chef, skinny boy!"

The man took a step back. "My name is Keichi. I am your butler, sir," he said simply. "Allow me to show you your late uncle's will."

Before you could respond, he turned and started walking through the maze-like halls of the mansion. You soon realize that the mansion was way bigger than you ever expected. So big in fact that you doubted you could find your way back to the exit if given a compass and a week!

Keichi leads you into what you assume was your uncle's study. You never really knew much about your uncle, every once in a while he'd drop in for birthdays or holidays, bringing gifts from exotic countries he'd traveled too. You never got the sense that he was trying to show off his wealth-he was just eager to share with you and your family the spoils of his many hobbies.

In the center of the room was an ornate mahogany chair and a large screen TV. Keichi took his station by the screen and you, a little hesitantly, sat down in the chair. Keichi switched on the screen, fast forwarded a bit, and suddenly you were greeted to the face of your uncle.

You hadn't expected a video will, but you though it suited your uncles style just well.

He was propped up on the bed, tubes attached all over hid body, but still smiling, just as you remembered him. "And to my favorite grand-nephew," he smiled because you were his only grand-nephew. "I leave my house all it's grounds, my business and fifty-percent of my estate. Should be more than enough to keep you happy and feed for the rest of your long life." With a wink, he added "I also took the liberty of hiring a brand spankin' new staff, my boy, treat 'em like princes alright?"

You uncle then addressed the camera in a more business tone, talking you assumed to an old business partner. Keichi switched the TV off.

"S-so... You mean I own all of this?" You ask, flabbergasted.

"Yes, Master," Keichi replied impassively.

The two of you sat in silence.

"Wow," you say finally. It was all you could think to say. The enormity of the gift and the loss of your uncle stole all other words.

Keichi glanced at his watch, "It is time for dinner, sir. Allow me to take you to the dining room." Keichi's last words were muffled by the sound of the door being kicked in.

"Yo, chuckles!" You cringe immediately recognizing Taiga, "Where do you want the Master's shit. Cuz far be it from me to mess up your holy itinerary." You note the duffel bag full of your things that you had hastily packed slung over his shoulder.

For the first time, Keichi looks visibly riled. Not much, but the scary neutral expression was broken just a bit. "You are interrupting the master, already."

Taiga glances over at you and his face lights up in a grin. "Well look at that." He bowed, mocking the controlled and reserved bow Keichi had done earlier, "Forgive me your Highness." The joking, good natured tone of your voice put you at ease a little. Keichi seemed nice-if a little too intense- but you thought you'd go mad if everyone addressed you as 'master' or 'sir' all the time.

Keichi apparently did not feel the same way, "Get out!" he yelled jabbing a finger at the door. "And take off those disgusting boots!"

Taiga was just about to reply, when another head poked into the door. This face was much more feminine, and was framed by long brown hair. "Well, well, well what's going on in here?" he asked playfully.

"Nothing, Sai." Taiga muttered.

Keichi turned to address the new man, "Sai, take the Master down to the dinning room please."

The man-Sai-rolled his eyes alright. He gestured at you, "C'mon you must be super confused bu now."

You nod and almost leap out of your chair.
