You spend much of the next week being shuffled from business meeting to business meeting (by an increasingly flirty Taiga). Apparently, there was more work involved in inheriting a large estate than you had originally suspected.

One thing was for sure though- your great-uncle had been right. You could easily just sit on the estate and live comfortably off interest alone. Not that you had any intentions of doing that. It seemed like such a waste.

You'd earned your degree in business-paid in part by scholarships and by your great-uncle himself. Besides, you would have to be a complete screw up to squander this fortune.

Still it was rather stressful now that you was in charge of all the zeros. You'd kept your uncles old financial managers (a couple of stodgy old men who looked like they'd never smiled once in their lives), but all the decisions fell to you: invest in this company or that? Buy more of this stock or sell, sell, sell? Even what pieces of primitive art that your great-uncle had painstakingly collected to be part of the newest gallery.

With a yawn you throw your pen down and stretch. At least you can depend on your servants. They've been as busy as you have-Taiga and Ryujin have been busy transporting everything that wasn't nailed down in your old apartment (and a few things that were) to the mansion, Sai was working night and day to create a new wardrobe for you (one more befitting of a fabulously wealthy heir and less like a frumpy between jobs college grad), Megumi had taken it upon himself to make sure that the inside of the mansion was as spotless as the outside (and that Taiga and Ryujin didn't damage anything in transit) and Keichi and watched over all of them with an iron fist. It was nice to be able to depend on other people again, it was a luxury you hadn't had since your parents died.

A rap on the door knocked you out of your musings. You were just about to call out come in, when Taiga barged in anyway.

You roll your eyes at him, "Come on in, Taiga, don't be shy."

"Don't mind if I do." With a devilish grin the red-head flopped down on your bed.

"So. Was their something you wanted?"

Rather than answering, Taiga remained silent, his shit-eating grin spread from ear to ear though. Not being able to stand the silence, you turn back to your work.

"I swear, Taiga, if you're only in here because Keichi's hunting for you head..."

"Oh, I assure you, I'm not here because of Keichi." He whispered in your ear.

You startle, not expecting Taiga to be the close to you. You hadn't even heard him get up! He chuckled, deep in the back of his throat. He placed one hand on your shoulder and the other against the small of your back. It crept up underneath your t-shirt and began to trace small circles up and down your spine.

"I am here, just for you." He breathed, warm breathe coming out in little puffs against your neck. You shiver involuntarily.

You cock you head, to look at your cheeky chauffeur. He's still wearing that devilish grin, but his dark green eyes are half-lidded and lusty. Suddenly, you realize this is the closest you've ever been to your not so secret admireror. Now that he was so close you could see the light smattering of freckles across his cheeks and nose and his long dark eyelashes. Also, a few suspiciously placed holes running through his eyebrows and ears, that might once have held piercings. You wonder what he looks like all done up. Despite yourself, you had to admit to yourself that he was kind of cute- in an impish sort of way.

He chuckled again and began to lean in, slowly. Glacially, one could say. Giving you plenty of time to pull away or push him away if you wanted. Of course, you don't. Like a deer trapped in a headlights.

When he was mere inches away from you lips, he paused again, head slightly cocked. Waiting, for you probably, to either bridge the gap or pull away. You pause and lick your lips.

"Oh, for the love of." Taiga rolls his eyes and plants his lips on yours. This isn't your first kiss, far from it. You've been on dates, had relationships. Hell even experienced the more carnal pleasures of life, but before they had always been controlled affairs. Not spontaneous like... like this.

Taiga's mouth began to mouth slowly, and as though they had a life of their own your lips began to move as well. The red-head's hands moved up from your back and to your face, pulling you closer and deepening the kiss. You smile when you feel Taiga's tongue flicking out of his mouth and brushing against your lips. You keep your mouth closed though. Gotta keep him in his place after all, no need to let him get too cheeky.

After a few minute, Taiga pulled away. If possible the grin on his face had gotten even wider.

You cough, and turn away, "Right, that was... Uh." You stand, "You should probably get going now."

Taiga pouted, "What? Seriously."

You look away, blushing furiously, "Yea. Listen, Taiga, you're really great but, ah," You scratch the back of your head, uncertain how to proceed with you-ahem- little secret, or if you should even tell the red-head at all.

Before you can decide, you are interrupted by...

You look away, blushing furiously, "Yea. Listen, Taiga, you're really great but, ah," You scratch the back of your head, uncertain how to proceed with you-ahem- little secret, or if you should even tell the red-head at all.

Before you can decide, you are interrupted by a sharp knock on the door.

"Master!" You immediately recognize the voice as Sai's, "Can I come in?"

You spring out of your chair and away from Taiga. The red-head doesn't move. You do note his brow wrinkling in frustration. "Yeah! Come in!" You call, thankful for the interruption.

Before you can finish your sentence, Sai laughs and grabs ahold of your hand, "Oh no! Someone didn't come to the fitting, so he doesn't have his new uniform yet."

Sai stuck his tongue out at the red-head. "Come along, Master." Your tailor then drags you out of the room, displaying a surprising amount of strength for his skinny frame, and slams the door behind him. You think you can hear Taiga groaning in frustration and flopping on the bed again through the door.

Once in the hallway, Sai laughs again, "Oh, master, you dog."

You frown, "What?"

The tailor laughs again and pats your hand. Somehow you get the sinking feeling that within the hour the entire staff would be aware of Taiga and your's 'clandestine' meeting.

You sigh and pinch the bridge of your nose with your free hand.

Sai leads you through the twisting turning halls and once again you find yourself hopelessly lost. Taiga would just have to wait, as you weren't getting back to your room any time soon. You feel relieved when Sai finally pushes the door to his workshop open.

That relief disappears when you see the remaining members of your staff in there, half naked and in the midst of changing.

"Saaaaaii." Megumi held up a pair of slacks. The small man was wearing only his underwear, a pair of dark briefs that left absolutely nothing to the imagination. If you had to guess, you'd figure he must have put on a few pounds since you last saw him.

His belly, while never flat, had developed quite the curve to it, and hung almost an inch over the hem of his underwear. And that wasn't the only part of him that had expanded as well. He'd developed thick (and temptingly grabbible) love handles, flabby arms and a soft doughy chest. His rear wasn't spared either. His ass had expanded into a mountain of jiggling fat and his thunder thighs were large expanses of milky flesh. As he bounced on his feet, you could see his entire fat body jiggle and shake, from his double chin to his calves.

Once again a blush graced your cheeks.

"Saaaaii!" The man continued. If he was aware of the effect his body had on you (or even aware he'd gotten this large) he was doing a good job of concealing it. "My uniform doesn't fit!"

The tailor frowned and snatched the khaki's away from Megumi. After checking the stitches, he cast a critical eye at the gardener's fleshy belly. "Well, it fit when I was taking your size. Maybe if you didn't eat so much sweets."

Megumi rolled his eyes.

Sighing, Sai tossed the khaki's back at the man. "Well, put it on the best you can for the Master. I'll take it out for you later." He waggled a finger at the smaller man, "But don't gain anymore weight! You hear me!"

Finally ripping your eyes away from Megumi, you glance over at your other servants. To your surprise, a bit of a curve has begun to take to their bellies as well. On Keichi, who was rather thin to begin, with it was almost unnoticeable- just the slightest curve. But when Ryujin bent over, you spied love handles beginning to form at the cook's sides.

Confused you glance over at Sai. The man was continuing his argument with Megumi (while desperately trying to pull the smaller man's pants over his thighs) and didn't notice you watching him.

Unlike the others Sai was still skinny as a rail. You sigh and pull your eyes away from his flat belly.

Then it hits you. Hadn't his belly been concave a few days ago. You glance back. It was definitely flat now (perhaps the result of packing a few extra pounds on?).

Still confused, you look over at Ryujin-as he was your chief and likely the source of this development. To your surprise, his dark eyes were fixed on you. You blink, in surprise trying to read his expression. As always, though, it was impossible. After a few moments, you look away, embarrassed for some reason.

"Phew." Sai whipped imaginary sweat off his brow. "That's as good as it's going to get." He looks at you, chocolate brown eyes sparkling, "So tell me what you think? Pretty amazing right?"

Before answering you take a moment to survey your staff-if only to make Sai happy. Keichi's usual plain black suit had been replaced with something a touch fancier-and tailored and cut to his (new) dimensions. Ryujin had dawned a white chef's outfit, with your uncle's crest emblazonded on the breast. You note the outfit showed off his curving belly. Megumi's outfit had changed the most. Usually, the man would work in ripped up, grass stained jeans and a white undershirt- and his trusty floppy hat of course. Sai had dressed him in khaki pants and a pink polo shirt-again with your uncle's crest on the breast. However, the plump man was almost popping out of it. The polo was at lest a size too small, and while the two had managed to pull the khaki's all the way up, they'd been unable to zipper them up over Megumi's flabby belly. The young man's rolls oozed over the top of the helm, and a v-shaped section of belly pushed his fly apart.

Once again you blushed and had to look away.

"Yeah everything looks great."

"Awesome job as usual?"

"Course." Not that you knew what was Sai's usual. Still even you, the fashion impaired heir, could tell that everything had been cut and designed to the height of fashion and to accentuate the staff's body types. Sai had done an excellent job.

The man laughed, "Well, of course! If anyone could make these weirdos look good, it would be me."

You roll your eyes, "Don't you get a uniform, Sai?"

The brunette rounded on you, "My uniform is to look as good as possible." He waggled an eye brow at you.

Behind him, Megumi made a gagging gesture. You stifled a laugh.

"Right. Well, I'd better be going."

Sai ushered you out of the room. "Right remember you have a fitting tomorrow."

"Ugh..."

The tailor slammed the door behind you. His eyes darted to Keichi. The butler blinked. Sai jerked his head over at Megumi. The little gardener had already begun peeling off his new outfit and didn't seem to see the gesture. For his part the butler didn't make any sign, and slowly began to unbutton his vest.

"Sooo! You three will never guess who I saw in the Master's room! Go on, guess!"

Not wanting to impose on the few relatives you still had you learn to balance school and work. Fortunately, school was finished… there was no way you’d be able to afford college and paid the rent and eat… Speaking of eating you barely ate anything today. That was quite unusually since your apartment living area was far from luxurious. As you got close you saw how shiny it was and it had no scratches. Someone was living a good life… Maybe it came to pick up a poor heiress that will inherit money from rich relatives. You laughed to yourself at the thought. This wasn’t fairy tale world; stuff like that didn’t happen for real.

Scaling up two flights of stairs, you paused. There was clearly guy standing right at your apartment door and… was he wearing a butler outfit? …He couldn’t possibly be looking for you… There must be some mistake, wrong room or something you decide to go and clear it up. That was surly your home, but you still believe this must be some mistake. His eyes intently peer at your face and you wonder if you got something on it from work. “Would this happen to be your apartment?”

“I’m glad finally meet you! I've been waiting for awhile.” He expressed his happiness and finally let go of your hand but after he was done with that he continued to examine you top to bottom with his eyes. Then out of nowhere he was grabbing and stroking your side. Your only response was jump in shock. His hands moved up to your chest, then the shoulders and along your arms…

But suddenly his hand under your chin made you lift it again. “But nice facial features with some work you’ll be perfect~”

“Huh…? Actually I do but…” you tried to retort but like most of you conversation with his guy you were interrupted.

“And your name is…” The shocked looked on your face when he called you by your full name was all he needed for confirmation. You were absolutely dumbfounded… the idea of this refused to sink into your head.

Just looking out window, you watch the buildings go by as you travel off somewhere away from your home. As your mind finally caught up to present time you turned to the long-haired butler that dragged you there.

“Um…” you began not knowing where to start, seeing you were so suddenly pulled out of a life you were custom to.

Was he encouraging him to come on to you again?!!

I know it just hard to admit when you like it.” He threw you a wink that you didn’t know how to respond to. It was guarantee this will be a recurring event while you were living here. His bark is worse than his bite, so feel free to give him a smack if he getting too aggressive.”

14222.content:
The inside looked as flawless and elegant as the outside, you had no idea that floors could sparkle like that and the color white could be so pretty. The ceilings were high and the hanging golden chandler that lit the room gave the front area a very spacious and fancy appearance. Your entire apartment room could easily fit between the front door and the stairs. And this was only a small part of the building… This huge mansion now belonged to you…… You simply didn’t feel like you belong anywhere near this place with your plain peasant clothes. Then there was Sai whose flamboyance looks made him fit perfectly in these surrounding…

Your silent observation of the area got disturbed all the sudden. Your stomach growled loudly and you only reaction was wrapped you arms around you concave belly. You still hadn’t eaten anything since early this morning… All of the excitements made you forget you were famished.

“Hungry I see,” Sai amusedly chuckled before stopping to think about something, “Kei wanted me to bring you directly to him when you arrived, but there’s no need to starve you. Let’s get you some food from the kitchen~”

Hooking your arm again and with pep in his Sai began to lead you down a series of hallways very quickly… You finding the entrance again by yourself would be impossible, but as a delicious smell entered your nose… you didn’t even care about anything else. It was a grand dinning room you were brought to. There was a long table with a stylish tablecloth, candles placed on it for decoration and classy and comfy looking chairs. The whole table could probably hold over twenty people with its grand size. As you were walked up to the table you noticed that the chairs were made for a person of a much greater girth. It could probably fit four of you in it comfortably. Sai sat you down in the middle of a large chair as he continued across the room.

“Hey Ryu, bring out some food…” The flamboyant tailor, called into a small window before glancing back at you. “And make it extra nutritional.”

That comment made you look down at yourself. You had to admit… those years surviving with little has caused you to have a skinny, underweight built… As you rubbed your sides you could feel your ribs… Is this what Sai felt when he touched you earlier…? He did call you bony… A little extra nutrition in your diet couldn’t hurt.

“Your food” A tall man in a chef outfit rather plainly said as he set a plate of food in front of you. Firstly the plate itself of giant but then it had food densely packed on it. You didn’t even know when you last saw so much food at once. It smelled wonderful, you stomach let out another growl.

“Thank you for the food, Ryu” You thanked the man and you were about to dig in.

“It’s Ryujin.” He corrected you and it then got quiet. This time you noticed that there was a bit of an intimidating air about the guy despite the few words he said. He silent stare was making you a bit uncomfortable.

“Thanks, Ryujin” you spoke back after sudden awkward moment of silence. It seemed to make him happy to hear you said that. He nodded back at you, which was an okay to you.

Your stomach grumbling once again in protest and you finally took your first bite of the food. You were nearly in tears, it was so delicious! Seasoned to perfection and very flavorful… it has been so long since you ate real food. You seriously started digging in; stuffing your mouth full, like you were always told not to but you just couldn’t stop yourself. You did manage to not lose all of your table manners as you still used the silverware to cut and eat the meal. You polished the whole huge plate in only minutes. You got every little crumble from the plate into your mouth, but even after eating that much you wanted more… It was definitely from you not eating much. Oh, how you yearned for more of that food.

“Thanks for the food it was incredibly delicious! I don’t think I’ve ever had such a wonderful meal… Would it be alright for me to have seconds?” You complimented and then asked. It made Sai laugh for some reason.

“Yes of course, you are the master. You can eat as much as you like.” Sai answered you, still chuckling. He told Ryujin to bring you another helping. You were the master… you could probably get real used to that…

145.content:
It'd been another hard work day for you. The rain was almost nonstop, making the yard of the house you had to paint covered in mud. That only made the work itself more uncomfortable then it already was. Today you'd just surveyed a bit to see how much paint you would need and to give the woman a good estimate of cost. You'd started this business in the hopes of finally making enough money to support yourself and pay off your student loans. You had a degree in business but you hadn't been able to find a job in the field right off the bat and you had to do something.
You came home to your small apartment that afternoon exhausted. Your head had kept you up all night and you'd had to work early that morning. All you wanted to do was take a shower and hopefully take a nap, if you could fall asleep properly this time. You came in and peeled your muddy work boots off by the door and went straight to the bathroom, the rest of your clothes following once you were in there with the door shut. You examined yourself in the full body mirror, as you usually did before a shower. Your figure was thin, almost unhealthy. Despite no longer being a college student, you still ate like one, your cabinet containing mostly Ramen noodles and boxes of Kraft mac and cheese since you didn't have many customers and plenty of bills to pay. "I guess the college diet doesn't make you fat after all." You chuckled a bit. You hadn't expected anyone to say anything as you lived alone but sure enough...
"But living in the lap of luxury might." A second masculine voice made you jump out of your skin. "What the hell are you doing in my apartment!?" You said angrily after a second. "I have a gun in here." You were lying through your teeth but you hoped it would make any burglar turn tail and run. "I have a key. You gave your uncle one when you bought the apartment and he gave it to me to come get you. I'm your chauffeur." The man explained without fear, the gun comment not affecting him at all. "How did he give you the key if he's dead? He died a month ago, I was at his funeral." You were slowly putting on your clothes again as you spoke. "He gave it to me before he died. I'm a member of the new staff at his estate, which you've inherited."
You took a second to think about that as you came out of the bathroom, dressed again. The man was sitting on your living room couch, which you could see from the bathroom. You felt under-dressed in your jeans and slightly wrinkled work shirt compared to his perfectly pressed suit and slacks, even his shoes were polished a shiny black. "You are a beauty, I wouldn't mind even if you were fat." He chuckled. His comment threw you, you weren't used to being flirted with at first sight. "Uh yes well I suppose we should get going then to my uncle's estate." You try to brush it off but you're sure that you have at least a slight blush to your cheeks. You put on a pair of sneakers, and with that, he leads you out with your arm under his like a gentlemen and you step into the back of the black limousine he's driving. Before he took off, he lowered the window. "I'm Taiga by the way, and it is an absolute pleasure to meet you, Master." He flashed you an impish grin before starting the car and driving.

The estate was giant, and when you walked into the brilliantly decorated foyer you were pretty sure your entire apartment fit in just this one room and you couldn't stop a "Wow..." from leaving your mouth, making your chauffeur chuckle. His personal favorites of course though are in this mansion. But you won't have to worry about that. Keichi takes care of all the feeding and cleaning." "Taiga! I swear to god you can't meet someone for 5 seconds before you're hitting on them!" A firm man in a suit was walking towards them and he smacked him across the cheek. "I apologize, Master. If he causes you any more trouble, let me know. I'm Keichi, the butler. It's a pleasure to meet you." Even though the words coming out of his mouth were pleasant, his tone was cold. Just then a much happier person walked in, almost the complete opposite of Keichi. "Oh I missed you coming in, dang. I wanted to meet you first. Oh well I suppose I'll settle for second." He practically skipped over with a tape measure. "I'm Sai, your tailor! It's sweet to meet you, Master." You almost laughed at his cuteness as he measured you. You'd actually thought he was a woman for a second before closer inspection. He paused as he wrapped the measure around your stomach and you felt a little embarrassed. He said encouragingly, obviously picking up on your awkwardness and trying to make you feel better.

"Thank you." You mouth to him and he whispers. "You're welcome. I didn't mean to make you feel bad." He smiled. You were already liking your new servants, well most of them anyway.

It was your day off and you were spending it wrapped up in a warm blanket and sitting in front of the TV. It was a really good drama playing that you would probably only watch once since you didn’t watch TV a lot and keeping up with drama after missing a few episodes was impossible. The main female protagonist was crying over the bleeding, unconscious body of her boyfriend injured after a car accident. She was crying and screaming over and over again for him not to leave her. You were starting to tear up yourself as the memory of you long departed parents crept into your head. You grabbed the heart-shaped locket hanging around your neck; it was the last gift they gave you.

Knocking on the door pulled you away from the drama and the emotional state you were in. You put the TV on mute and gave your teary eyes a rub as opened the door. Once your hand left your eyes, you were staring straight at a tall thug. You felt in danger and your instant response was to quickly slam the door and lock it. Your attempt to do so didn’t work as the street punk grabbed the door and stopped it from closing. No matter how hard you pushed with your full body it was not budging. Just one forceful pushed from the other side of the door send you sailing backwards, and all you could do was look into his green eyes frightfully.

“D-Don’t hurt me!!! I don’t have anything of worth to take but you can take whatever you want! I only have a little cash on me but you’re free to have that too!!!” You immediately blurted out things you thought he wanted to hear out of fear. His face showed no new emotions as he approached you. Your body was shaking uncontrollably as you stupidly backed yourself into a wall. One arm went to the side of your head and his body came in close to you.

“I can take whatever I want, you say… Then I’ll take you.” The red-haired thug sexily whispered that to you as he softly caresses your cheek. There was aroused looked in his eyes and you remained frozen as you just stared into his eyes. You were suddenly confessed to by a thug and now you couldn’t help but notice how good looking he was.

His warm, slim fingers moved down to your lips before he gently stroked them with his thumb. His lips were puckered as he moved in for a kiss. Your course of action was to clamp your mouth close and to tightly close your eyes… a brilliant plan… for a three year old. You were just afraid of resisting and angering him… or so you told yourself. You were waiting to feel his lips on yours any second…

“Ouch,” the man suddenly yelped and you slowly opened an eye to peek. The redhead was holding the back of his head and standing behind him was a pale black-haired man. What really caught your attention was that he was wearing a full butler outfit.

“I should have known better than to bring you, Taiga” he plainly stated as pushed up his glasses. His eyes turned to you and gave you a cold stare that was far scarier than the thuggish person you were just dealing with. “You’re ….. the niece of the late Master Lucas, correct?”

“T-that is my name, I did have an uncle named Lucas…” You remember hearing about Uncle Lucas passing, but you didn’t go funeral… after your parents’ it was really just unbearable to go see another sad burying your remaining family members. You did send a card with your regards.

“Good, now come along,” he instructed with a impersonal tone, there was no emotion in his voice or expression… You actually thought that might prefer the other guy over this cold and unfeeling interaction you were having now. “Hurry, we don’t have all day for you stand against the wall.”

His icy demeanor you made unable to talk to him… So like an obedient dog you grabbed a jacket, turned off everything and left with that frighteningly, unfriendly butler and the street punk who had confess his love for you… Oh… what were you getting yourself into…?

One long explanation later…

You and Keichi, the butler that picked up from your apartment, had nice long and very awkwardly formal chat about your Uncle. Apparently he had left had his entire fortune, this mansion, his business, everything to you… it was all a little hard to believe but there it was in black and white. All of these was now yours, and free for you to use however you please… whatever that might be. You were too accustomed to living with just enough money to live somewhat comfortably.

After the very uncomfortable conversation Keichi, the pale butler began to lead you to the Dining Hall to meet the other people that worked here. While you were walking in complete silence, you glance around at the hanging art and decorations that filled the sides of the hall. You were getting really nervous about meeting everyone… if the other people, other than Taiga, were as stiff and proper as Keichi, you don’t know how you would manage it…

“We’re here” the ever aloof butler announced and you took a deep breath as you followed behind him. You spotted the three of them standing by the table. Taiga was among the group waiting for you. With them side by side, it made the different between them obvious. They were all different in both shapes and sizes. “Where is Ryujin?” Keichi asked the group, it looked like there was one member not present at the gathering.

“He’s finishing up in the kitchen,” the taller guy you didn’t know informed him.

“I see, let begin anyways. Everyone this is the new master of the house.” He introduced you still with that uncaring tone of voice. It was safe to say even among his fellow staff member he still had that icy cold attitude.

“…Um hello… I’ll be staying here now…… Please take care of me.” You nervously greeted everyone with a deep bow. Oh man, you were super tense… What kind of people were they? Would hate they that you were their new master? Everything was so uncertain… it was nerve-racking.

“Hi, I’m Megumi” smallest person of the group spoke first. “I’m the gardener, so if you want any pretty flowers or something I’m your guy.” Megumi was tiny little blond thing in height but his built was largest of the group. He was plump all over but his was round belly and forming mobs were the most noticeable in the shirt that was looking a bit tight. You weren’t sure if it was because he was short and chubby but look like a grade school student, a very cute elementary kid.

“Keep your flowers to yourself, shrimp if the little princess wants flowers I’ll get for her personally,” Taiga spoke suddenly as he jealously glare at Megumi. The man walked up to you and grabbed you hand, and shrank away a bit as he did so. “Don’t worry, I’ll take real good care of you~” He cooed and it made your heart beat and this time wasn’t out of fear. You earlier learn that he was your chauffeur.

“Now, now Taiga, don’t hog the new Master all for yourself,” the next guy spoke up and pretty much snatch you out of Taiga’s grip. He had long silky brown hair and soft facial features that were feminine. When it came to his built, he was thinner Keichi… almost skinnier than you and you don’t really eat well. “Hello Master, my name is Sai and I’m a tailor. I’ll make you lots of pretty outfits.”

“Hey, hands off she’s mine.” Again your thuggish crush growled, this time at that the tailor and swiftly separated the two of you.

“You can’t be selfish, we all want to know Master better.” Sai retorted back teasingly with a big smile on his face.

“Yeah, I want to be good friends with Master, too” Megumi also added his statement though his was much sincere sounding than Sai’s.

“Beside…got to put my hands all over to get her measurement.” The brown-haired man mention continuing his teasing tone and it set Taiga off. The two when back and forth arguing over you, surprising it made the atmosphere less suffocating. You felt better knowing it wasn’t going to be some cold master and servant thing going on here. You laughed in relief at Taiga and Sai little verbal battle.

“Ah, Master finally smiled” the small gardener pointed out with a chirp in his voice, “It’s really nice you should smile more.” With that statement the two other guys stopped to stare at your face. It was pretty embarrassing having them all staring at you suddenly, but at least you weren’t too nervous and tense anymore.

“You’re finally here,” Keichi spoke again and it startled you a bit. You forgot he was here with all the liveliness in front of you. “This is the new master.” You followed his eyes to meet the dark eyes of a tall man, taller than everyone else, in a chef uniform. It may have been his tall stature there was an intimidating air coming from him.

“I’m Ryujin.” The guy clearly stated and didn’t look like he was going to say anything else. He continued to silently stare at you. All you think of to do was bow your head and throw him a friendly smile. He just nodded his head back at you. You finally notice the silver platter his hand that you’ve only seen in movies. He place the plate on the table before he plainly saying, “Dinner.”

Seeing his eyes didn’t leave you, you assumed that was your food. You moved to the table and sat in the seat in front it. You couldn’t help but notice how comfortable and big the chair was, three people could probably fit in it with no problem. As the top came off the platter, the wondrous smell filled your nose. It also looked just as delicious. You couldn’t remember the last time you had a meal that look this good. You were almost drooling over it. You wanted to dig in right away, but that would be rude before everyone got food. You glanced around they were all staring at you again.

1522.content:
You, Hitomi Uharu, were feeling a little overwhelmed at the moment.

Losing your parents at fifteen was a terrible blow, but an unknown benefactor had kept you in good stead. After all this time, you learned that the benefactor in question was your Mum's brother, your Uncle Iori.

Unfortunately, before you ever had a chance to meet him in person, he too had passed on.

From the writings he'd left you, you learned that your Mum's branch of the family had been rather wealthy, and her family most certainly did not approve of her marriage to a commoner. She'd been cut off, but Iori had ignored the will of his father and helped his sister out whenever and however he could. After the accident that claimed your parent's lives, he'd paid to keep you afloat while fighting to become your legal guardian, a fight made more difficult by your grandfather's lawyers.

Iori had been diagnosed with cancer and died less then a month ago. This might have been the end of the story, except for one thing; he'd named you sole beneficiary.

Iori had diversified from the main family and become quite successful in his own right, and no matter how bitter your grandfather was, even his legal staff couldn't block Iori's last will and testament. He had, quite simply, given you a multi-million dollar shipping company as a final parting gift, as well as the mansion you now found yourself in, its (rather unusual) staff, and a spot in Hideki Academy, one of the most prestigious schools in the country.

The board would operate the company in your stead until you came of age, and Iori had given only a single instruction:

"Hitomi, I wish I could have been more in your life then a mere name on a cheque, but such is not the path Fate wrote for us. I never married, and never had any children of own. My work was my life, and that I leave to you, my unknown darling. I ask only one thing, and that is that you keep the company. Maintain and expand it as you see fit. I've no doubt that you'll do splendidly, my dear. You may feel small now, but with time and effort, you shall grow into your role. Your parents and I will watch over you."

You'd shed a few tears over that final missive.

And so here you were, now 17 years old, having lived in the manor for the last few weeks. School would be back in session on Monday, and your story picks up on the Saturday before...

******

You were sitting at your make-up table in your bedroom, dressed in a loose fitting nightie. Your stomach was in knots as your nerves were completely on edge. With school starting on Monday, you would be heading out to the mall for your uniform. Sai, your tailor, had been very put out when he learned that his creations wouldn't be worn on campus, but the academy had a very strict uniform policy, necessitating a trip to pick a few up.

Quite frankly, you were scared beyond words. In a relatively short amount of time, you went from losing everything to being a millionaire heiress, and once done with college, you'd be the head of the one of the largest import/export companies in the country. Actually, scared didn't quite do the feeling justice.

"I don't think I can do this."

You weren't left to your thoughts for very long, and you turned towards your bedroom door as the massive walnut entryway creaked open. Keichi, your young head butler, entered without warning. Always a punctual man, you checked your cell phone on your desk, and sure enough, it was 7:01 am exactly. His sense for time and lack of sense for personal space was the primary reason you were wearing the nightie, as the man had had no qualms walking in when you were in a state of undress.

It had taken far longer then you cared to think about to convince him you could dress yourself.

He was accompanied by Ryuujin, your personal chef. Neither man was given to excessive words, but Ryuujin was certainly the more talkative of the two. His appearance was certainly fearsome. His arms were like tree trunks, and his well developed pecs stretched his white uniform to its limits. A large scar ran down his face, bisecting his left eyebrow and running down, stopping a few centimeters past his lower lip. He had so far refused to say anything on the scar, not that you'd had the nerve to ask anyway.

Ryuujin was pushing the cart that undoubtedly contained your breakfast, and as the two came close, Ryuujin let out a wide, pleasant smile. Keichi couldn't have been any further from his unlikely compatriot if he tried. Cool, aloof, and distant, he came within a few paces, and gave a small bow with his right hand held across his chest.

"Your breakfast is served, Master."

The skinny, black haired young man stood straight as Ryuujin lifted the silver lid off the platter. Your eyes widened and you let out a small gasp at the spread before you. "That's way too much food!" you thought as you eyed the massive spread before you. French toast, pancakes, scrambled eggs, waffles, muffins, cinnamon buns and more, all were served on the large silver platter. The fact that you could make out the edge of a second cart in the hallway made you wonder just how much food Ryuujin had prepared.

That had been one thing that had stood out since you moved in here, and that was just how much food was always present at mealtimes. Your chef always made far more then any person could ever eat, and he definitely seemed to favor sweet foods and pastries, as these featured heavily at every meal. Your staff refused to eat at the same time as you did, which had made you very self conscious initially. But it had smelled so good and tasted even better, and you'd managed to overcome that hump for the most part.

Still, having people standing around watching you eat remained an unusual sensation, and there was always so much. Ryuujin always said it was to make sure that "Little Miss" never went hungry, and that you didn't have to eat more then you wanted. It still conspired to be an uncomfortable prospect, and you often caught yourself wondering if it was rude not to at least sample each dish, or if eating so little of such a big meal was also rude.

"Ryuujin, I've said before that you don't need to make so much."

The Chinese chef smiled, "Apologizes, Little Miss. Once more, I seem to have gotten carried away. Simply enjoy what you need, and I shall deal with the rest."

You bit your lower lip apprehensively. Your meals had been so opulent since you came here that you were worried about getting fat. But it all smelled so good, you were somewhat hungry despite your nerves, and it would be very rude to accept nothing after Ryuujin did all this work. What do you do?

After all of Ryuujin's work, you just couldn't turn down the offered fare. Likewise, though, you couldn't eat all of it either. And so you'd decided to sample it.

All of it.

You'd taken at least a mouthful from every individual dish, and some considerably more then that. Of course the first cart he'd brought in had been loaded with every sugary treat your overactive sweet tooth desired, and your willpower was sorely lacking where such things were concerned.

He'd made an entire loaf of bread into tiramisu french toast, though you'd limited yourself to three slices.

A small stack of Oreo cookie pancakes loaded with chocolate chips had quickly followed suit, and you'd happily chewed the delectable morsels down with a soft coo of enjoyment.

Next, you'd had one of Ryuujin's homemade cinnamon buns. They were sinfully rich, and while you'd intended to only eat a bite, they were so, so good. Before you'd realized it, you'd finished the one bun in its entirety, and had taken a mouthful of a second. A little embarrassed at your lack of either control or awareness, you still finished the bun since you'd already bitten into it.

By this point, you were already aware of just how full you were getting. Despite using the offered cutlery, your hands were still slightly sticky, and you were aware of some crumbs that had dropped down and stuck to the front of your nightie.

You already felt so full, and your lower lip quivered a bit with dread as Ryuujin pushed in a second cart, which had been loaded even higher with fatty breakfast foods, and you weren't yet finished with the first one. Still, you'd decided to try one of everything, and you needed to at least try...

******

Well, you'd succeeded, if barely. The last dozen or so mouthfuls had felt like sheer torture, and frankly you didn't know how you weren't sick right now. You stifled an unladylike groan, and did your best to stretch out without making it apparent that that's exactly what you were doing. Too late, you realized that the hand you'd been rubbing your belly with had been far from the cleanest, and you'd left a nice, sugary mess on the front of your nightie. If either of your two servants noticed, they made no obvious sign.

"Ah, Little Miss, to see you enjoy my food so thoroughly, why it warms an old man's heart."

Despite the pain you were in, you let out a soft chuckle at Ryuujin's comment. "Ryuu, you're twenty five. That's hardly old."

You were fairly certain you saw a faint blush on Ryuujin's cheeks, but before he could speak, Keichi butted in. "Master, it is hardly appropriate to refer to your servants so informally."

Now, normally, you found it very difficult to deal with the cold demeanor and strict formality of Keichi, but the discomfort you were in left you feeling a little short. "Perhaps in public, but that hardly matters when we're alone."

Too late, you regretted your statement, but if Keichi had taken any offense, he made no sign. "As you command, Master."

Checking his antique pocket watch, Keichi continued, "I shall have Taiga prepare the car at once. We are behind schedule, and the store closes in only a few more hours."

You thought to make a remark about hurrying to a place of business which wouldn't close until five, but instead had to stifle a belch that had too much potential to become something far worse. After you'd swallowed that uncomfortable thing back down, you said, "Alright, I'll get changed and be right down."

Keichi bowed. "Shall I help you change, Master?"

"For the last time, no you may not! Did you help my Uncle change!?"

"Yes, Master."

"Well, I am perfectly capable of changing my own clothes, so no thank you! Just wait downstairs!"

"As you command, Master."

Ryuujin gave a far more extravagant bow. "Will you be back in time for Second Breakfast, Little Miss?"

You felt the blood drain from your face as your already pained belly twitched at the thought of more food. "No, I'm good."

"Ah. Perhaps brunch, then?"

"No, I really am good."

"Then perhaps a snack for the ro-"

"I said I'm good! Now both of you out!"

******

It took nearly fifteen minutes after the two men had left for you to feel well enough to try standing. Gingerly, you peeled off your slightly stained nightie and laid it on your bed. Truthfully, you wanted nothing more then to lay back down and stretch out, and sleep this painful stuffing off, but you knew Keichi would simply let himself in again if you didn't get downstairs soon.

You made your way over to the monstrous walk-in closet and opened the double doors. Everything in this house seemed almost comically oversized. Your bedroom was bigger then your parents' old apartment. Your make-up table was akin to a normal dining room table, and your four poster bed was a monster, at 365 cm squared (12 feet squared). Your closet was no exception, larger then most bedrooms you'd been in, and packed with clothes. Sai, the mansion's tailor, seemed addicted to sewing, and was constantly making and amending old and new outfits.

It didn't take long for you to settle on a skirt and blouse combo for the day. Sai considered your taste in fashion as rather bland, but given his love of lace and frills, you were quite happy he wasn't here now to complain at "such a waste of youthful beauty."

After donning your underwear, you stopped and looked at yourself in the mirror. Had you gained any weight? Honestly, you couldn't really tell. Your belly might have been rounder, but given the size of the food baby you were carrying, it was impossible to know for sure. Your hips looked a little curvier, and your bum a little bigger, but again, that could have been a trick after that painfully oversized breakfast.

"I wouldn't be surprised if I was, though. That's like the seventh or eighth time I've done that this week."

Your politeness was going to be the death of you. Ryuujin over did it at every meal, was constantly making and offering snacks without waiting to be asked, and you consistently felt compelled to eat at least a little each time trying not to hurt the big man's feelings. In the short time you'd been here, you'd been overstuffed several times each week, and were really starting to worry that you'd start blowing up any day now.

And, though you were loathe to admit it, you were as much to blame as anyone else. Your wicked sweet tooth meant you were often waiting expectantly for Ryuujin's latest offerings, and you seldom felt compelled to say no. The presence of the rest of the staff, Keichi chief amongst them, meant that you seldom had to sully your hands with anything approaching work. At a word, your every whim could be met with zero effort on your part. So, taking all that into consideration, why weren't you getting bigger already?

"My metabolism must be keeping up so far, but there's no way it can hold out forever. Still, I can't have gained any weight yet; all my clothes still fit. Still, I got to deal with soon or I'll wind up as big as a house."

Mind made up and with other places to be today, you quickly dressed and made your way out to face the world.

******

After Hitomi had left, Sai made his way into her bedroom. As well as tailoring, the young man was also responsible for doing the manor's laundry. He saw the dirty nightie on top of her massive bed, and picked it up. His sewer's eye had seen the young master in her evening wear last night when she came down for a slice of cake.

"Ah, my fair mistress," he said aloud, since he had no inner monologue, "it seems I must let out your wardrobe a bit more once again..."

152231.content:
"Alright, the car is ready to go."

"I said to prepare the Bentley."

Taiga just rolled his eyes. "Trust me, she'll dig the Rolls."

Keichi refused to break eye contact with the person he considered nothing more then an ungrateful street punk. "The Rolls Royce was Master Iori's."

"So, what, it'll just collect dust in the back of the garage?"

"It is for Master Hitomi to decide its fate, not you. Now put it back and get the Bentley."

"Geez, what're you being so uptight about? We can use it this one time."

Keichi narrowed his eyes. "As long as I sign your paychecks, you are my subordinate and must obey. I shall now use small words so that you can't possibly misinterpret me. Go. Get. The. Bentley. Now."

"Or what?" Taiga growled in the back of his throat, his volatile temper rising.

"Or you're fired. Until the young Master comes of age, final say regarding the manor staff is my prerogative. And I will not have a little rat undermine this family at such a critical junction for such a foolish reason."

Taiga's temper snapped at that remark. "Oh, well, I'm so sorry my choice of car will apparently destabilize the power structures of the world at such an important time. Who died and made you in charge, huh!?"

Keichi's answer was simple and blunt. "Master Iori."

Both men were silent after that for awhile. Keichi never understood why Master Iori had brought home the kid who tried to steal his wallet, nor why he hired him to be his chauffeur when he insisted on driving himself everywhere. Taiga's failure to even act with the basic respect befitting a servant regarding his master had always rubbed Keichi the wrong way.

For Taiga's part, he found Keichi infuriating. Both had been born to the same class, and yet everything about that pompous jackass, from his glare, to the snide tone of his voice, to his dismissive mannerisms, made it clear that he thought he was superior to Taiga in every single way.

Both, however, agreed on one thing, and that was loyalty to the family. Master Iori had been their life, and the new Master gave them a continuation of that life. Neither man knew the nature of the debt the other owed to the Old Master and his niece, but they knew it was there, and was about the only thing that kept them both tolerating each others presence, if only barely.

Grumbling under his breath, Taiga returned the Rolls and grabbed the proper car.

******

The two men stood in silence for a long time. Keichi was as still as statue, heels together and arms crossed behind his back, facing the door Hitomi would soon come out of. Taiga was hardly prone to sitting still, and was constantly adjusting his posture, twirling things between his fingers, and attempting and failing to whistle.

Keichi was already somewhat annoyed with the punk, so it was even more unfortunate when Taiga decided to speak.

"Gods of Fate, how much longer can she take?"

"A servant should not complain about his Master." Unknown to both men, Hitomi had only just staggered stiffly to her feet, and was currently trying to pull off her nightie while attempting not to bend.

"Guess it's just the consequence of having a woman master, huh?"

Silence.

Taiga continued. "Guess we'll just have to get used to it."

More silence.

"Still, she's a lot easier on the eyes than old Iori was, eh?"

"Stop."

Taiga smiled at finally getting a response from the haughty butler. "C'mon, tell me I'm wrong. Cute face; long, black hair; soft curves-"

"End this topic of conversation at once. It's improper."

"Says the guy trying to help her change."

"One of the duties of a butler is-!"

"Yeah, keep telling yourself that. Bet you were just trying to cop a feel of them tig ol'bi-!"

"She is a child!"

"Please! She's 17, hardly a kid anymore. And she'll be 18 in a few more months, then all bets are off. Hell, maybe for her birthday I should show her how a real man does-"

Taiga never got a chance to finish his sentence. Keichi moved with almost blinding speed, and before the chauffeur could blink, the lanky butler had him against the car and a long thin blade against his throat.

"For your continued good health, I would not dare finish that sentence."

Taiga gave a grim, predatory grin. "Oh dear, did I strike a nerve?"

Keichi did not respond to the question. "If you ever raise a hand against the Master, I will bury your corpse in the garden."

"Is that a threat?"

"No; simply a statement of fact."

Taiga's grin grew a little wider. "You'd be planting yourself right next to me."

Keichi felt a solid object move near his groin. Without looking, he knew that somehow the street punk had drawn his own hidden blade while he pushed him against the car and now had the weapon lined up for a killing strike against his femoral. The two stood in silence for what felt like hours but could only have been a heartbeat or two, before Taiga spoke once again.

"You know I'd never hurt her. She's a sweet girl and the Old Boss was a good man, and I won't give a good turn a bad one. But whatever Iori said, you can't protect her from everything. And if she wants me, I'm hardly about to say no."

Keichi was most certainly not happy with that response, but despite his virulent hatred of the man, he knew Taiga was being truthful, if rather crude. The lanky butler wasn't ready to spill another's blood over this, and he slowly drew back. Taiga straightened himself up, adjusting his clothes, and folding his butterfly knife and putting it back in his pocket. Keichi hid his stiletto back wherever he'd drawn it from, and was back to the prim, perfect butler a heartbeat later.

Again, Taiga broke the silence. "You going to tell Boss Lady about this?"

"There are certain things it's improper for the Master to know."

"I fuckin' knew you'd say that." Any other words the men might have said were forestalled as the great oak doors of the mansion opened, and Hitomi Uharu made her way out with a smile and a wave.

“Hello. I understand this must be a large shock to you, but welcome nonetheless,” the muscular woman with the husky voice said, “My name is Suzu. I’ll be the nurse around here and for awhile in charge of most of your affairs. To my left is Anya, the head maid, and to my right is Kate, who, I must warn you, really doesn’t talk a lot.”

You nodded in acknowledgement, feeling somewhat uncomfortable. Anya seemed to regard you with the same level of regard that a cat would pay a mouse she couldn’t devour. Her heart-shaped face was beautiful, no doubt about that, and, with her locks of scarlet hair, she was quite a sight to behold. You were long aware of your sexual preferences as a lesbian, but this girl seemed to both discourage and encourage your preferences. The girl Kate, however, was just as adorable. She had a round, chubby face with beautiful albino skin, her scarlet eyes staring right at the ground over her plump little belly. You wanted to just give the girl a massive hug, but decided against it.

It wasn’t the right time.

“For the next few days, I’ll be doing a lot of your paper work and will require your signature from time to time, but otherwise, you are the Master.”

“Okay, I’ll try to do my best,” you stammered, nervous from this pressure put on you and equally nervous that you’d do just what you longed to do to these women, hold their bodies in your arm and never let go. You were above such all-consuming desire.

“Anya will show you to your room for now,” Suzu replied, turning away.

Anya grumbled slightly to herself as she guided up upstairs, glancing down at the ground. “So you’re the Master’s niece?” she finally said, grumpily.

“Yup,” you replied, morose.

“Can’t believe we got stuck with such an idiot,” Anya mumbled.

“What was that?” you stammered, eyes wide with frustration, “What did you say?”

“You heard me. You aren’t half the man my master was,” Anya mumbled.

“Well, first off, I hope I’m not. I kinda have a vagina,” you replied, emphasizing the rather naughty choice of words, “Secondly, I’m his niece. I’m not gonna be identical to the guy, ya know?” Who was this jerk talking to her like this? She had some nerve calling HER an idiot. If anything, Anya was the idiot for treating someone badly before getting to know them, before understanding anything. Intolerant little—

Anya sighed, heavily running a hand through her hair. It was then that you noticed a tear running down her cheek, her eyes red and sodden. She hid her face behind her hair from then on, or at least her eyes, to keep anyone from noticing the tears she cried. You felt anger subside, but not ease away. Was she just lashing out at you because she was sad? That wasn’t any excuse, but even so, at least it was a reason.

“Here’s your room. Take it,” Anya mumbled, walking away, “Don’t complain, it’s the best in the estate. I’ll bring you dinner in your bed.”

1543.content:
You take a deep breath as you look ahead. In front of you is a massive elegant mansion, decorated with various statues and surrounded by fields of elegant of gardens. The mansion makes your apartment look like a mouse hole in comparison.

And now it belonged to you.

You found out recently that your uncle Lucas had recently passed away and left everything he had to you. Apparently he had no next of kin, but was close to your parents. His house and wealth were all yours now.

You smile and walk up to the door, opening it to see a row of women all waiting for you. Two of them were maids; one was a red head with a bit of a scary look to her face and the other was a somewhat plump albino girl with white. Next to them was a small girl dressed up in a chef's outfit with two black ponytails. She looked like a little girl, but something was a bit off. The two women next to them however made the three look small in comparision. One was an amazon of a woman, having somewhat built tanned body, dressed in a doctor's outfit. The other was a very fat girl with blonde hair, squeezed into a security guard type uniform.

"Greetings, Mistress!" shouted the girls in unison, as they bowed to you. You figured they must have been your house staff.

The doctor lady walked over to you and smiled, "My, your uncle didn't tell us you were so cute,"

"Uh...thank you...?" you blushed in embarrassment.

"I'm Suzu. Your uncle's doctor. He insisted on having me around especially in his later years," explained the doctor.

"I'm Mimi! Nice to meet you! I'll make you a yummy yummy meal that's sure to give you energy for whatever late night activites you have planned!" smiled the little chef girl.

Say...what?

"I'm Mika!" shouted the fat security girl, giving you a big squishy, yet somewhat crushing hug. "You can depend on me to keep your home safe,"

The scary-looking red head then said, "Hmmph...I'm Anya...I'll serve you as it is my job..."

"..." went the albino girl.

"Oh, that's Kate. She's a mute, so she doesn't talk. It's a long story," answered Suzu.

You smile and said, "Well I guess my uncle definitely was a man...he had all such beautiful women around him. I don't even know what he looked like,"

"That's him over the mantle," said Suzu, pointing.

You turn your head and your jaw drops. WHOA!!!! That photo you saw was of the biggest, fattest man you ever had seen in your life. You wondered how much of him WASN'T in the photo. He had a big smile on his fat mustached face.

"That was my uncle? Wow..." you sweatdropped.

"Yes. It'll be a challenge meeting his requirements for the inheritance," Suzu said.

"Huh?" you blinked.

"Oh, didn't you know? You don't get to keep the inheritance unless you can gain 700 lbs over the next three years," said Suzu.

SAY WHAT?!!!

The chubby chef soon left for the kitchen. You sigh to yourself, wondering if she's arm wrestling partners with that (what was her name again, Suzu?) Amazoness looking doctor woman. You feel a bit uncomfortable looking around. Sure, it's nice your uncle left you all this in lieu of not having any other blood relatives but it feels like it's a bit much. Not to mention the fact you have to get obese if you're even going to inherit it all! Sure, you had thoughts of...gaining weight, but they were mostly fleeting ones. And...the women did look cute...

15511.content:
"Yo, we're here~" the almost singsongy tone of your abductor sends a chill down your spine. Abrubtly, you are hoisted out of the limousine and tossed carelessly to the pavement. As you lay there, spooked out of your wits with a sore jaw, your eyes travel upward to meet the gaze of an older gentleman. Someone you immediately recognize: "Uncle Lucas!" you shout in a mixture of confusion and fear, wriggling about on the driveway.

He gives you a silent lookover, only to turn right back to the driver, "Taiga, my boy?" he states plainly, "Was it really necessary to hogtie the child?"

"I had to!" your kidnapper grunts as he fiddles with the ropes holding back your wrists, "I asked him to get in the car and he ran away!" You arch your back to get delegate, "I thought you were gonna do wierd sexual stuff to me, or mug me or something!!" your voice is hoarse from all the screaming, "And you gagged me- that doesn't help!!" Taiga chuckles, "While I would like to do some weird sexual stuff to you-"

"Taiga, that's enough." your uncle steps in, ouutstretching a friendly hand to help you off the ground, "No need to frighten him." You can't help but add 'that's already been done' to his sentence. "Yes, sir." he says nonchalantly, walking back over to the driver's side. "Nephew, say hello to Taiga, my personal chauffer." Uncle Lucas chuckles. "Hi... Taiga..." you awkwardly wave to your former abductor, who winks flirtatiously and purses his lips in response, "Let me know if you're up for any of that weird, sexual stuff you mentioned earlier." Taiga purrs as he hops back into the driver's seat and starts to park. While you are more than a little put off by his advances, your uncle merely chuckles, "Oh he's a scamp, that one." Scamp. Yeah, that's the word.

"Come in, Nephew, I'll put some tea on."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------
Inside your uncle's home is amazing, you'd only been there a few times during elementary school and couldn't quite remember the layout of such an elegant home. "Would you like another cup, nephew?" he asks kindly, noticing your empty cup. "No thank you Uncle, and you don't have to call me 'Nephew', you know my name is-"

"Oh come now, I insist." he laughs heartilly and pours you another cupful, "It's good for you, better than any of that soda pop you kids drink these days." Feeling obliged now that he had gone ahead and poured you another cup, you merely smile and take it, "Th-Thank you Uncle." you say after a small sip.

Slowly, conversation blooms between you two. He asks how your folks are, how living on your own was, and if his favorite nephew was getting married anytime soon ("Come on now, Uncle, I'm still young!") And in turn, you asked how he was holding up in his estate after retiring from a long life of working hard ("Retirement, pheh.") And after a few more cups of tea and a trip to the bathroom, your dear Uncle Lucas sprung quite a suprise on you:

"You're moving to France?" your voice cracks slightly from suprise

"No, no, not moving my boy!" he chuckles, "Simply housesitting for an old friend, though if I like it I may pick up and move..." you watch as your eccentric uncle loses his train of thought. "And... you brought me here to tell me that you're going to France?" your excitement grows at the thought of travelling abroad, simply sitting in first class on an airplane satisfy you. "No, wrong again!" he says, picking up his cup for one last sip of herbal tea, "While I'm house sitting in Europe, I need you to stay here and keep things in order!"

You feel your heartbeat race, confusion ensuing yet again, you can't feel your toes; "Wh-What?!" you almost scream in your suprise. "Yes, yes, while I'm gone I need you to stay here and take care of my affairs, don't worry I trust you!" he chuckles gleefully, "It has to beat living in that overpriced studio apartment." He did have a point there.

"W-Well when are you leaving?!" you ask, watching as the elderly man stands up. "In about an hour or so." he says plainly, grabbing his hat from the table.

You twitch, "Uncle Lucas, you're nuts."

155112.content:
Slowly, you massage your aching jaw with one hand, the other one shoved as nonchalantly as possible into your pocket. Your jaw really hurt from were you ended up frenching the concrete like that. The possibility of a chipped tooth, or maybe worse, isn't that far off of a possibility. And one that you can't seem to keep tucked away in the back of your mind either, with every step you took up these stairs your jaw started to hurt a little more. "Great." you grumble through your pinky finger and the intense throbbing pain experienced in your lower masticate.

Three flights of stairs and a state of total disbelief had done little to help your grumpiness. On top of getting abducted off the streets, you had been thrown head first into your uncle's driveway and then sexually harassed by your abductor. But on the other hand, you were handed a big mansion on a silver platter and a plane ticket. So things weren't too bad...

You kept telling that to yourself as you walked further down the hallway, mumbling to yourself that this was just like those extended stays with relatives around the holidays; "Just without the relatives."

Your uncle's words repeat themselves over and over in your head, "Go to my living quarters, feel free to make yourself at home!" You couldn't help but notice the one problem with his statement- without anything to "be at home" with, just how exactly were you supposed to do that?! An exasperated sigh escapes your lips as you come to your room, er-rather, Uncle Lucas' room...

You wrap your hands around the doorknob, still warm, and push on the heavy fixture. Your eyes widen slightly in acknowledgment of the room's layout. He seemed to be a fan of lilac, the soft color decorates his walls, his curtains, and even his bedsheets. The floor is tiled and kept pristine white, a color shared in the luxurious love seat laid out to face the fireplace.

Your uncle's choice of words hit home as you take a seat at the foot of your new comfortable bed, laying down with your feet still firmly planted on the floor. You release a contented sigh, closing your eyes for a second so you can breath. After all, if anyone deserved a breather, it would be you. What with the kidnapping and the gray hairs your uncle was surely going to give you. But then again, if everything was as nice and comfy as this bed, maybe this little vacation wouldn't be so bad...

Suddenly you feel the other side of the bed sink. After a cute little yawn, a voice says, "Excuse me, I must have fallen asleep while I was waiting for you... that loveseat sure is comfortable." You can feel the foreign body inch closer to you, an arm stretching to touch your chest in hopes of a little nap time.

Your eyes shoot wide open to see...
